Our first escape room. This was our first escape room experience. We did it as a couple and it was great fun, we did the jungle room and nearly escaped without any hints, I think they forgot to tell us the bomb counter reduces each time you enter a incorrect code which was the only reason we did not escape. Great fun and well thought out.

Unexpected Thrill!. For my birthday my girlfriend surprised me with bringing me here without me knowing anything about it. I had a pleasant surprise in trying to beat the clock. It was an unexpected amount of fun, thrill, teamwork and cooperation I did with my lady. Luckily "God" (Voice from speaker) was there when we needed him to assist when we needed something more. Shout out to Daniel, he was an amazing host to the experience. My girlfriend and I highly recommend this cool experience and adventure to anyone who enjoys critically thinking and solving a puzzle. Def something I would do again!

Great fun!. I was there with 5 of my colleagues and we totally loved it! Great fun and much more difficult than expected, so kept us well busy for the whole 60min! Recommended if you're in Amsterdam and have spare time for a fun event :)

High quality escape room !. Very friendly welcome by Daniel. Relaxed and enthusiastic, positive atmosphere. Beautiful area of Amsterdam. Two very different escape rooms. We did the Jungle room - interesting and surprising challenges. Good level. Very well thought through - well developed escape room. Highly recommended. Challenging, but not too difficult.

Great experience !!. First time escape room for us, but what a great experience ! We had a lot of fun doing this with the family last night. Fantastic to see that every member in the group is providing its brainpower to solve the puzzles. And togeher we made it !!! If you would like to do something with a group/family, this is definitely something to consider. Thanks Daniel for being our host.TimeTripDiensten amusement366 vind-ik-leuksVind ik leuk

Mind boggling experience. As the title states: it was mind boggling. A wonderful and refreshing activity that gets your blood pumping. The hosts are passionate about the experience they offer, which translates in a sublime service from start to finish. We would recommend it to anyone, as we already have to more people than we can count on our both hands. Merely a day has past. The room itself was stimulating and versatile and we can't wait to try their medieval room.We wish (and know you will have) the best of times there.With regards,Kaye and Damiano

Once in a liftime experience. I only heard about this experience, but once we booked a room it was a big rush of entertainment and adrenaline!
The host was really relaxed and the establishment was calm and near the Anne Frank house in the centre of Amsterdam.

Great rush kind service. Great experience, highly recommend if the weather in Amsterdam is not great but you want to have good fun
Kind service, Herman was helpful throughout the whole event, thumbs up!

Very good room!. hard riddles, very entertaining, the stuff are very kind!
I would reccomend it for a group of 3-4 people.

Very challenging and pleasant. We went there with my wife, and I did not know what to expect.The place is really small but welcoming and the staff is very pleasant and helpfull (before they put you at ease, and keep watching that things go fine).The impressive part (maybe it was us) is that some stress builds up pretty quickly as you try to solve the various riddles/quiz, as it forces you to use various trial and errors techniques (although a lot are link to mathematical riddles).It is not overly difficult but as always the time clicking clock adds a interesting part to the solving.If you want to spend one hour doing something really different and making your brain works, this is a very good place....
Awesome Team Event with excellent hospitalitz. We went to the Escape room as part of our team event. We received great hospitality and had a lot of fun in the rooms. I can highly recommend the visit.

Very nice. Great crew and nice handling challenges.Place is 20min by foot from the main station.The Medieval is not very hard, hence it's a good challenge for those who are getting started in Escape Rooms.
Must try!. I went to this with my family! (teenagers)At first we were not sure of the room but the puzzels were entertaining.I do recommend it for all ages!
Awesome experience. It was my first experience with escape the room puzzle, but it was very enjoyable and thrilling. For sure recommend for anyone spending some time in Amsterdam.

Too easy, unfortunately. Unfortunately, we found the hardest room a quite easy. With a few adjustements, the room could be made a lot more difficult to solve. We got out in 35 minutes, just by hardcoding one puzzle and following the numbered boxes. We were actually quite disappointed it was not more challenging... Also, a highscore board would've been nice!

very cool and creative puzzles and friendly staff!. I have been to 4 room escapes in Amsterdam and this one is for sure great! Friendly staff and great puzzles. I will make sure I come back for the other game as well.
Great puzzles and surpizing experience!. Just a good escape room in the centre of Amsterdam. Flexible hosts, a nice talk after our escape and a great experience. Go!

Good time. Staff was friendly. One room was easy compared to other escape rooms that I have been to. The other wasn't an escape room. You had to diffuse a bomb by the time given. That one was challenging.

Awesome Escape Game experience. TimeTrip is awesome. My family and I had such a great time with this game. Difficult as you would expect, but not so much so that our 13 and 9 year olds felt left out. This is our second Escape Game and everyone agreed that this was their favorite. Very convent location in the heart of the city. If you're in Amsterdam, be sure to put TimeTrip on your "must do" list.

Great first experience. I visiting with my boyfriend and we had a fantastic time. The owner was very approachable, friendly and helpful, giving us hints in the game and for other recommendations in our exploration of the city including other escape rooms afterwards whilst we enjoyed our coffee. We completed the jungle room with a few minutes to spare. He gave us an extra 10 mins as there were only two of us and it was our first time. The puzzles were challenging and enjoyable. The rooms set the theme well. We look forward to doing the other Medieval room on our next visit to the city.

Great First Time. For my first time doing an escape room, this was a great experience. Plenty of puzzles that I felt I could work out, good setting for teamwork, and enough challenge to keep us on our toes.

Great fun!. A brilliant idea and an awful lot of fun. We went in the Jungle room which was pitched at the right level for our 12 and 15 year olds to be fully engaged in. We just wish we'd had time to complete the Medieval room too!

Top Time at Time Trip. This was my first ever escape room experience, but I was a fan of tv shoews such as Crystal Maze etc. back in the day, so I was excited to see if I could experience the same sense of excitement and suspense directly.I was not disappointed! The puzzles were difficult, but solvable, and never once did I feel "cheated" by the solution. The location was great and the host was friendly and professional.I did the Medieval room and for sure I will be returning to try the jungle room. All in all a great way to spend an hour.

We had great fun. We did the jungle room as we had already done the medieval room (which was awesome). The jungle room was a bit easier for us since we already had a lot of the knowledge used in the puzzles. Anyway, we were really hyped and looking forward to the point they will open a next room somewhere!

Fun in Amsterdam. This place was great. We had an excellent time, and the guy running the place was super friendly, kind, and helpful. We did the Medieval course and had a blast. The puzzles were fun, challenging, and rewarding. We finished right one time, so I would say it was well tuned for 3 people. Do yourself a favor and spend an hour at this escape room!

Brilliant hour, great fun. Came here based on trip advisor reviews and wasn't disappointed. The guy running was great, very friendly and more than happy to fit us on earlier than the slot we'd booked. Never done one of these before so we did take the full hour ( with a couple of well timed hints) but loved every second, highly recommend this for anyone to do.
A great expirience. We booked the Medieval room as a couple and it was great. My wife first dont want to go but she was excited and happy after we finished the room in under 50 minutes.

Great medieval fun. It was the first escape room for us, and the experience was great! Fun (but not easy to crack) puzzles and the attention for detail in the room was amazing. Our host was very friendly.

Great fun for family and friends!!!. We went as a couple and played the Medieval Room. It was very fun, we made it out in an hour and four minutes with a little help... Totally recommended for everyone and we definitely want to try the Jungle Room. The Medieval Room is more active while the Jungle Room is more logical. The owner is very friendly and helpful.

Medieval time trip! - Great double date!. Had a great time solving all the puzzles and riddles. The room really makes you work together as a team to make it out on time. We just made it out on time! Also the guy working there is very friendly and takes time to explain about the escape rooms they have. I can definitely recommend it!

Great Family Activity. We are a family of four, two kids ages 11 and 15. We did the Medieval Room and it was so much fun. We worked together to solve the clues and finished in one hour plus two bonus minutes. We all agreed that is was a unique and entertaining experience. We highly recommend it!

good escape room. Very nice and not too expensive. A good activity to do with a group of friends. It was our first time and we made the jungle room in one hour, it was not too easy so very interesting. The location is great because in the center of amsterdam. We will come again for sure.

Fun for me and my friends. This activity is made up of a room and you have to solve the puzzles to get out safely you only have an hour to escape and the puzzles are great team building activities. Me and my friends had loads of fun and finished with 5 mins to go :) it also is for anyone above 12 years old and you can bring infants with adult supervision.

Jungle room - super fun !. My friends and I had a really great time in the Jungle room !It's a nice way to spend some time with your friends, doing something different. Perfect location in the city center, and super friendly staff. I'll come back for the medieval room !

One of the best. We did a few escape rooms in Amsterdam already and this is one of the best. There are almost no locks and keys in the room, but more mechanical and electronic stuff. What makes the room in my opinion very good. The guy, who helped us, was really friendly. We definitely come back to do the jungle room!

great. This was a great time. We did the medieval room only and was on a very hot day so only one of us wore the outfit. We had no experience but we made it through in just over one hour. The host allowed us over the time limit he said since we were on the last clue when time went up. He was friendly and explained it all. We found it a bit challenging for our first one but now that we have did one I think we could cut out time down a fair bit. We enjoyed it and had we had time on our short visit, I would have liked to try the Jungle theme. Very well done with good host.

Disappointing.. We did Jungle Room and it was very basic: a sequence of boxes/puzzles. It was like "Put on this jungle jacket and hat and the solve some puzzles. There was little or no interaction with the room/environment.

Fun for the family. I completely agree with the review below. We also did the jungle room and you don't need to search for clues but open boxes. But we like puzzles very much and therefore we had great fun. The staff was very helpful.

Great riddle game for beginners.... Great riddle game for beginners... this was our third escape room and we found it to be a little too simple. We did the Jungle escape, which was a great concept based on scientific puzzles. The only thing different with this escape room was that you did not have to search for clues around the room. Instead, they had series of boxes numbered 1-6, each containing a puzzle that would give you a key to unlock the next box. The staff was exceptional, and we would consider going back if we were with friends who had never done a riddle room before!

Awesome first experience. I went with 3 friends who already had experience with escape rooms. It's a truly amazing experience. With lots of screaming and excitement. The puzzles were clever with a few clever hidden clues. I really loved it. Will be back for the other room!!

Puzzle me this. . Two teens and their parents were sent into the jungle to disarm a biological bomb set to wipe out the Amazon and us!We had a great time working together to figure out the clues to this puzzle. They were able to get us in last minute and were very friendly and helpful. Two thumbs up and a Stanley Nickel for this fun activity.

Very good for beginners. This was our fifth escape room. We found this one to be a bit on the easier side which would make it great for beginners. We did both the jungle room and the medieval room. Both were very fun and clever. We enjoyed the medieval room a bit more. The hosts were amazingly accommodating and nice. They allowed our two year old son to partake in the festivities with us! There was nothing negative about this place!

Great experience with really nice hosts!. I received the Room Escape experience as a Birthday present and I couldn't have asked for a better gift. We did it late on a Monday night and it was a great thing to do on a rainy evening. We were received warmly by the hosts who speak great English and then we put on the medieval uniforms and entered the game. If you've ever done an online version then you know what to expect a little, but the real-life version was much more fun. We are planning to go back and do the jungle escape in the near future. I recommend it 100%!
Great guys, great game. A pretty easy series of challenges with just 2 rooms, but the guys were great, offering just the right amount of help, and the puzzles were fun. Recommended.

Something different to do. Went with 4 friends to TimeTrip in Amsterdam when 3 were visiting town. It's something different and exciting to do while touring a city to break up the museums. Everything was run great and we all had so much fun, recommend for friends or family time!

Great!. We had the chance to visit the Scape Games that TimeTrip offers! We visited the first time the JungleRoom and we liked it so much that we came back next week for the MedievalRoom. The hosts were also super nice!! 100% recommended!

Nice couple test!. Me and my girlfriend went to TimeTrip for the Medieval escape room. I like the fact that you enter room and have actually no idea yet what to do. Once you enter the room you need to explore and find out what to do. Challenging games.. and braincracking was involved!I would recommend this to anyone as it is fun to do and for any age suitable!

Great TimeTrip!. Medievel room was great! A lot of puzzles to do with your hands and a lot of surprises :) Afterwards we talked with the owner about pros and cons, they're open to feedback and wanna make the TimeTrip even better. Great experience, and great location too.
AMAZING!. Did the medieval room together with my girl friend and It was an amazing experience. Way to enthusiastic all the way to the end. The two hosts are also do a really good job!

What an experience! Definitely worth taking, especially with teens.A real intelectual challenge.. We -two 14 years old twins, a very energetic 12 years old girl and one grandfather, did not know exactly what are we up to. The surprise was complete. One does not know even where to start... then the brainstorming went into action and inspired results. One by one, with few hints from the guide outside the room, we cleared step by step all the obstacles and locks and managed to get out in time. All thrilled ,enthusiastic and cheering. This was the last thing we did on our visit to Amsterdam and certainly the climax for the teens. Recommending to do the same .i.e. leave this experience to the end of the trip.

TOP IN THE CITY! . We did both the Medieval and the Jungle Room games and loved them both. The games are well thought out, fun, and always keep you thinking. Also we are pretty sure the host, Rudy, must be the nicest guy in the whole country. Definitely recommend this escape company. Must-Do if visiting Amsterdam.
Great experience. First time in an escape game and it was absolutely brilliant. So detailed and well thought out. We loved it

Well thought out game! The best escape-experience in Amsterdam yet!. Well thought out game! The best escape-experience in Amsterdam yet! When you are thinking about booking an escape room in Amsterdam pick this one! It is the best!
Great escape room. We think the best in Amsterdam. Medieval room was a great experience. The balance is perfect. Not too difficult, but also no to easy
The best! . I've never had so much fun! These guys know what they're doing. If you ever go to TimeTrip tell them Jundy sent you and you'll have the time of your life!

You wanna do it again and again!. Amaaaaazing fun, super friendly guys organizing it, definitely going for the more challenging one soon! We did the medieval one, not the most difficult but enjoying like a little kid :)

Awesome!. This was my first ever visit to an escape room. Surely I didn't know what to expect. Once me and my friends started the challenges it was amazing. We solved the mysteries in both the Medieval and the Jungle Survival room just before the time was up. The guys at TimeTrip did an amazing job with the mysteries and also managed to create a great adventurous atmosphere. TimeTrip is definitely worth visiting!

New in AMS, good fun, good challenge.. We've been to quite a few escape rooms in the past year and TimeTrip AMS is amongst the top. This is a branch of Trap in Budapest and they brought over the Medieval room and a new Jungle room. This time we tried the Jungle Room. Very well built and very creative puzzles, good fun! If you like a challenge, this is a good one.

Great for a couple. We did an escape room in Vienna (Exithink) that was fantastic and he recommended we do this one in Amsterdam. This one was way more puzzle focused, not as visually beautiful or surprising but really clever puzzles. If you prefer puzzles like those in Survivor, and clever logical thinking without having to sort through information then go here! The host was really, really lovely. We did the medieval one, would love to go back and try jungle.

Quiet the medieval adventure!. I did the medieval escape room yesterday with some colleagues. And it was Great! I had no idea what to expect but it's great to discover the room together and solve the mysteries. Everything is put together nicely, and looks great.Very good as a team building event or just for fun with friends and family.Nice detail: you even get to put on a medieval 'suit'. Can't wait to get back and try the Jungle adventure including jungle outfit!

Great experience at TimeTrip!!. We have done both escape rooms: medieval as well the jungle theme. And we had a great time together! I can recommend everybody to do both the escape rooms, starting with the medieval theme. Good luck!

Really awesome escape rooms!!. We had a lot of fun solving the puzzles and escaping from the rooms. The hosts are really nice and I can't wait for them to open a new escape room to try out! If you want to do something fun with friends, this is the place to go!

Great! Fun! Exciting!. We had a great time solving the puzzles and riddles of both escape rooms. First we did the Medieval room and had so much fun that we just had to do the Jungle room too. Very nice owners! Prices are well worth it! Fun activity to do with a bunch of friends

So much fun!!. What an awesome escape game. Me and my friends played some escape games before, and this one is so incredibly fun. They have a second room with a different theme, and we're definitely coming back!
Loved it. We had sooo much fun. And the guys are very nice and helpful. If u havent tried something like this then definitely go for it.

TimeTrip Escape Room. My team and I enjoy visiting escape rooms all over The Netherlands. We participated in the Medieval Escape Room today and had a fantastic time. Great atmosphere, polite staff and ideal location. This room is great for a family day out too! We will certainly be returning for their Jungle themed room!
FUNtastic. It was a really fun and well organised entertainment. We were together with our friends and I can say it was a great team building for us. I am going to recommend it to my collegues.

Lots of fun!. Came here with 4 colleagues for an after meeting activity. Games were really fun and engaging. Everyone loved it! Recommend it for those that haven't tried it. Not at all claustrophobic. Good fun.

Get lost in time!!. This was definitely money well spent. Our boys are 9 and 12 years old and that was not a problem at all. The kids ( and us) had so much fun trying out the medieval room, and we thoroughly enjoyed all the detailed work and attributes. Not only is the room a different experience than just you're average activity, the hosts are very welcoming and kind. I highly recommend to test your family in team spirit, guaranteed success!

Great unique experience for me and my girlfriend!!!!. Had a very interesting and fun time at a great location in the heart of the city. Hosts were really nice and helpful. Will come back to try the jungle game on our next visit. :)))

Drop-dead stone-cold amazing!. Went in with a group of friends to see what all the fuss about escape rooms is about and see if it's anything special or just another tourist attraction. And let me say that it is an experience of a whole different level - very immersive, you completely forget about time, have tons of fun and make your brain work in ways you usually don't. The only disappointing part is when it's over and you can't do it again for the first time. Definitely recommend it for those who are tired of the run of the mill tourist attractions and want to try something with a soul.

Bonding time. The place is great, not only are the games a lot of fun, the team that's behind all this truly have a heart for the company. We had an amazing time and after a game like this you really feel more connected. Highly recommended!!

Unique, awesome, refreshing and challenging experience.. Went to visit Timetrip with a few co-workers. Had a lot of fun!You enter a room with a number of challenges, puzzles and riddles.Work together with your team members to solve all the puzzles and riddles. When you succes you andvance to the next room/ level. I felt like I was in some kind of video game!
Fun!. had a amazing experiance in the escape room! Very good for bonding. The game ask for team work what brings you in hilarious situations!Have fun!
A lot of fun in just an hour. Awesome experience, unexpected fun, really spent a good time there. We went with a group of 10 people for two rooms, which was maximum, but still really had a godo time.

Awesome. We did the jungle room and we had a great time, it was quite a challenge but we managed to do it.Our host was friendly and we had a good talk. It's diffrent from the other escaperooms we did in many ways. Our host was happy to take some advice. This escaperoom is fairly new but deserves a lot of visitors. It's also cool there were clothes for the two special rooms. You can read the stories online on the site for yourself but we found them to be quite good.

Do NOT miss TimeTrip - it's the best!. My husband and I spent 4 days in Amsterdam, and visited 3 escape rooms - we are pretty experienced escape room enthusiasts (Escapists? Roomers?) and were looking for some challenging rooms. In addition to TimeTrip we also visited the Escape Hunt Experience and Room of Riddles. TimeTrip was by far the best of these rooms, and was probably the best we have done in Europe. TimeTrip only opened about 3 weeks ago so it's still relatively easy to get a booking - I would strongly recommend doing so if you're in Amsterdam!!We managed to get a last minute booking for our last day in Amsterdam. We booked the Medieval room, and wandered through central Amsterdam to get there - unlike the other escape rooms in Amsterdam, TimeTrip is within a very short walking distance of the city and Centraal Station, in the pretty hipster Jordaan area. It's also close to loads of restaurants and cafés, so there are places to go for a bite or a drink afterwards.The Medieval Room was great, and caters well to people that love physical puzzles. It is built around a King Arthur-related legend, and is really on theme. The room and puzzles are of high quality, and it's obvious that a lot of thought has gone into making it fun and challenging. We were given costumes to wear during the challenge, which was a bit fun, and got out well within the time limit.When we finished the room, we asked to have a look at the other room at TimeTrip - which is set in a jungle. Rudy, the manager, said that the room was available if we fancied a go, so of course we said yes! The Jungle Room relies more on mental puzzling than the Medieval Room, and was a bit more difficult as well. We were given Jungle-related costumes to wear for this room as well, and really enjoyed it. I think both rooms would be great for first time or experienced puzzlers, but the Medieval room was definitely a bit more physical.Overall, I think TimeTrip is the best escape room of the three I visited in Amsterdam - and thanks so much to Rudy for being such a great host!!

Grate fun for my friends. We had such a challenging experience in the Medieval room that we ended up trying the Jungle room also. Beautiful atmosphere and tricky games that we all loved! Hosts were awesome. Thanks guys for such a fun time.

This is the best escape room in Amsterdam. Seriously, go to TimeTrip. It is so much better than the other escape room challenges. The staff are very friendly and welcoming. We did both rooms and both were really fun, the medieval room was particularly good. The jungle room was also quite fun and more challenging than the medieval room. The puzzles are very interactive and require working together rather than sitting on the floor solving a code on paper, which is what some other rooms turn into.The challenges are very unique, we have done a few escape rooms now and this was the best. Highly recommended!
You've got to check out Time Trip!. Had a great time at Time Trip. It's a great original idea. Lots of fun to try out when you travel in Amsterdam. Will definitely be back!

AMAZING!!!. I loved this experience! This attraction was not only professional but the staff were also very enthusiastic and friendly...The game itself was challenging which allowed for a lot of brainstorming and team work! I would most definitely recommend this unique experience to anyone looking for a great night out and for those who enjoy a good challenge!!

fun team experience. Today we managed to escape the medieval room with our family of 5. The challenges were very diverse and we had lots of fun. We really recommend it. We will definitely come back to do the jungle room! Thanks very much for a wonderfull experience!
Jungle in the city. Very original idea for activ relaxing and fun. I'd like to go back! Do you have another type of this game?
funfunfun. I enjoy it much :))) You feel Like Sherlock Holmes, you work on team, you succeeee!!!!!Big fun for everybody.
.Jungle Survile Room. Awesome game ! Very well constructed and conducted ! This is really detailed, really engaging and immersive . Thanks to all of you Julius

Really nice escape game. We have already done many escape game in Amsterdam, and this one is the best we did. It is totally adapted to family with children, and the game is pretty well articulated, the room is really nice and the atmosphere is really cool. We strongly recommand it

Our teenage dreams came true!. Last year we experienced their Wake Up room; which was already amazingly well designed. This time we took the Arcade challenge; a complete differently story with even more technology and lots of fun gimmicks to make the gamer experience a great adventure.
Highly recommended for experienced escape room fanatics on the search for something new.

Brilliant. Every city break we always do an Escape room (or two) and this is one of the best yet. Really well thought out and we only completed it (with a bit of help) in 1 hour and 2 minutes so a tough one- give it a go, it is a good one.

Claustrophobia Amsterdam. Great experience and full of surprises !
I would recommend it to everyone.... very reasonable ticket prices too!
The settings of the location could be improved a bit, to enhance the end to end experience

Very fun room. The new arcade room was really well done. We were only two but managed to complete it *almost* on time. There was quite a few interesting ways to interact that we had not seen before. We are not experience escapers, only done 4-5 rooms before. Very hospitable staff.

This is how it's done. Ever been in an escape room without combination locks that require 3 or 4 digits? Well, you can experience it here. They have put a lot of thought and effort in this room. In my opinion this is the most origional room i have been in (out of approx. 10 rooms). Looking forward to playing their other room.
Great Experience. it was our first time and it was a very fun challenge, The staff were very nice and explained everything we needed

One of our favorites. We loved this room. We have played about 10 as a family (boys are 10 and 12) and this ranks near the top. We love the games where there is automatic feedback for correct moves and this game has that. The game master gave us clues only when we were stuck and they moved us forward just enough to continue. We played the "Wake up" game and highly recommend it!!!!
Had a great time!. The room was very exciting, full of all kinds of puzzles and riddles. The team was very nice and friendly. The place was easy to find, and close to the central station.
Great attraction. So much fun! The host was very nice and lovely, she made it very clear and understood. Definitely we will come back for the second room

Great room (wakeup!). Nicely executed. Great mechanisms. Great decoration.
Great mechanisms.
Everything is really well thought and executed.
Definitely in my top 10 (out of 40)

Wake up takes you into the nightmare of a little girl.... This was the first escape room I and my friend had done. But we had a blast.The Wake Up room had an amazing, spooky atmosphere and we were completely immersed as soon as the door closed.The puzzles are challenging, but help is always on hand from the magic mirror and clues were carefully given, so they did not take away from the achievement of solving a tough puzzle.We managed to just finish the room with two minutes. The room is great for just two people and we had a great hour.The experience was only slightly marred by going back to try the other room - Alien Invasion. The team had technical problems, meaning we had to be pulled out of the room halfway through, which spoiled the atmosphere. While we were able to go back in, it ruined the flow and we missed out on at least one puzzle due to the problem. We did manage to finish it, but the puzzles are harder.The staff assured us that it was very rare they had problems with the room. For other gamers, I hope this is true.The staff are a real highlight of the site. They are friendly and cheerful and really add to the experience.
Great escape room!. We did the 'Wake Up' escape room and it was great! Cool riddles to solve and great hidden surprises!

Very funny, but could be even more difficult. We were two couples and really enjoyed this game. It was sad that it was over too fast. Afterwards we thought that in most cases our thoughts were too complicated and the solution was quite easy. Maybe it would be nice to have some room that is not also for children, so it can be more difficult and maybe also a bit scary.

Nice atmoshphere. The room was decorated very well, the sounds and lights were also very immersive. We didnt get realy well the last puzzle, so we needed a hint, but we escaped way ahead of time.Cool fun for some tourists while (and not only) is raining in Amsterdam!

Excellent atmospheric escape room. This is one of the best escape rooms I've visited. The room is ingeniously designed, together with an immersive story and clever puzzles that challenge just the right amount. The friendly staff helped round off a hugely enjoyable visit.

Great!!. First of all the service was great! We tried booking the room online but didn't want to pay by card so we sent an e-mail to the staff. The answer came right away, they reserved the room for us so we can pay in cash! How thoughtful :)Upon arrival we were greeted by Sarah with cookies, coffee and a wonderful smile.The room was well done, the atmosphere was as one would expect by the story, the puzzles were interesting and always with keeping with the storyline.Highly recommended to all puzzle and esc-room lovers
Amazing!. Went with low expectatiins after a not so great escape room experience previously. It was perfect!!!
Fun and just a little fear!. This was perfect for our first escape room experience. Challenging but not impossible and suitable for older children. Well presented premises and friendly host
Excellent challenge!. The room was challenging but logical. It had various elements to surprise me in a good way. We had a lot of fun together.

Excellent escape rooms. In the past year playing Wake up. We got a lot of fun , a great quest , despite the fact that we have a very experienced team . This year again spent a holiday in Amsterdam . Of course we came back to play in the new story - Arcade invasion. As we expected , the creators of quests at the height again. 100 % movement in history. Anyone recommend !!!

good fun and a break from the norm. First time in an escape room and really enjoyed it. Our host was really friendly and explained and told the story very well. 3 in our group and had one guy that really had no interest in going to this but ended up enjoying it more that the rest of us! Give it a go - is a nice wee break from the norm in IAMsterdam ;)

Wake up!. That was one of the most exciting escape rooms that we played before and after. It is not scary but gives a good feeling of mystery and miracle. All puzzles are interesting. We have never seen it before. And most of all we liked house... you will understand when find it inside of this wonderful escape room. Strongly recommend to newbies and experienced players.
Stuck in 7 year old dreams. The escape room is crafted very well. It is filled with fun stuff and surprises. Don't worry it not scary, but fun.
Awesome rooms!!. Claustrophobia is genius in making their rooms both playful and smart. Almost no keys or codes, everything unlocks mechanically! AWESOME!

Great fun. In this escape room you'll find yourself inside a dream of a 7 year old girl named Matilda and try to help her wake up from it. The sounds and decoration of the room set the atmosphere nicely, and the riddles and clues are well thought and nicely executed [everything was in English, no need to know Dutch]. The staff were very friendly and spoke English well. We really enjoyed the experience and highly recommend this room for anyone visiting Amsterdam and looking for a fun way to pass an hour.

Awesome!!!. It was an amazing group experience. The puzzles were challenging but solvable. Most importantly, we managed to escape just in the nick of time!!! It was my first time playing and it certainly won't be my last!!! Love it!!!

All fun and games. Visited the Wake Up room last weekend, as a group of four. Having played around 15 live escapes, I can safely say this now belongs in my top three. The room was innovative and fun, relying on puzzles and creativity as opposed to finding codes to crack locks. You can tell that a lot of time and effort has been put into the game. Definitely recommend for fellow escape addicts.

Most fun I've had in a long time. My life is quite fun and I enjoy it in general but even with that fact this was the most fun I've had in a long time!I played Claustrophobia's 'Wake Up' game and managed to complete it with 22 seconds left on the clock. Super thrilling.I definitely recommend it to anyone looking for a good time :)Very friendly staff, fun game and a very decent price!

Very Atmospheric Experience. Me and 2 friends, all new to the room escape craze, turned up to attend the 'Matilda' room and we are now hooked on these unique experiences.The room had a highly authentic feeling and was very effective in making you feel like you were in a movie or video game. This is due to the exceptional 'production value' in terms of the scenery and audio that accompanied the immaculately crafted puzzles. The flow of the room is also very cleverly handled, the puzzles grow in difficulty and often require all team members to combine their efforts to solve. Occasional hints allow the flow to be maintained without taking away the satisfaction of solving the puzzles yourself.We ended up completing the room with very little time to spare, it was a thrilling finale and left us feeling very proud of our efforts. We returned the next day to play the other room of which all the above can also be said.For first time players we would all recommend the 'Matilda' room simply due to the perfection with which it crafts it's atmosphere and the brilliant puzzle designs. One try and I'm you will be hooked like we all were don't miss out on this.

Great fun - exciting, challenging and well thought out.. Having done an Escape Room before and seen a few whilst looking around Amsterdam, we thought it would be perfect to get us out the midday heat. Trip Advisor and only being a duo, lead us to Claustrophobia. We booked easily online that morning and everything from start to finish was slick, professional and very friendly. The "Wake Up" room was incredibly well thought out, slightly creepy at times and challenged us, although hints available when needed. You could not move onto the next thing until completing the one before which was different from one we have previously done. We managed to escape but were 2 minutes over the hour time slot - which they allowed us to finish as only a duo and so close to the end.All in all, a great, fun way to spend an hour! Highly recommended.

Lots of fun. This is a great outing for a little team building event with your colleagues. Both "Wake Up!" and "Arcade invasion" groups were very satisfied. I personally recommend doing what I did and taking your upper management for a round of "Arcade invasion". The hilarious moments in the darkness will stay in your memory forever.The rooms are not too hard, but not too easy either. Unlike some other rooms I tried before, the staff is very responsive and the contraptions are well designed. The physical nature of the escape room puzzle means that sometimes you will push or pull, or twist something not hard enough, or the contraption doesn't work at the 1st attempt. In some rooms, you can get stuck for 20 minutes because of this. Luckily, this is not the case with Claustrophobia. The rooms are in great technical state and the staff is ready to promptly send you rhymed encouragement if you are being overly delicate with a device. Thumbs up, staff, you're doing great.Since the rooms are fairly "streamlined", with relatively few opportunities to get badly stuck, and not too long solving time, I think this might be great place for families or people wishing to start their adventure with escape rooms.

It's truly an experience you'll never forget!. The escape room "Wake up!" is the perfect combination of a little bit scary setting, a beautiful room full of surprises, braintesting puzzles, excitement and fun! My friends and I escaped on time, so we challenge you to wake Mathilda up and get out! Make sure your team is very enthusiastic and into teamwork and NEVER give up, just believe in yourself and you'll get out.You'll see the makers of the room really put time and effort into making this room so enjoyable for us, and the service is very good too! So thank you for the most amazing and surprising hour I could ever imagine! (you've made me addicted to escape rooms...)

Amazing fun and the perfect difficulty level. My boyfriend and I visited this escape room on our first visit to Amsterdam in July. We had never done an escape room before but were keen to try it out. We arrived at Claustrophobia and were greeted by a member of staff who was extremely welcoming. We had a brief chat and then were taken into the room. It was all done very professionally and it was so much fun! We did the 'Wake up!' escape room and the sound effects and atmosphere created in the room was spot on.We would recommend this escape room to anyone who likes a challenge and will definitely try out Claustrophobia's other escape room when we return to Amsterdam!

Awesome 2 days out. We had never completed a room escape before, and didn't quite know what to expect. I honestly thought it would be good, but I didn't think it would actually be amazing, and it was.We chose to do the Matilda room, and me and my bunch of mates solved riddles to escape the room, without giving anything away! The room itself had a vibe, which added to the atmosphere of the game.We had such a great time, the next day we re-booked and went on to the arcade version of the game.This was a more hands on, gaming escape room, with the key been to find the portal in to the gaming room. WE completed this in roughly 50 min.I would advise, for a first timer if your going for the atmosphere, and like horror games, Matilda isn't scary, but very atmospheric, and is my personal faveroute. If you like gaming, and solving many clues, like both, Arcade room is for you. (Both are really well planned out!)I hope, this persuades you to do a room escape and I would like to thank everyone for the free tea/biscuits up on been welcomed!

Very Good Escape Room. This was our 4th Escape Room in the Netherlands, as a group of 3 with more than 10 rooms in our resume.All of us enjoyed the room, and we all thought the atmosphere was just right, we finished in time and had a good talk with the operators as well.I'll recommend that to anyone who have already done at least 1-2 rooms before, as some concepts, in my opinion, will be clearer (and thus more fun) when you have at least some experience.

Best Escape room I've done!. I did this review with one friend and we got really far, it was a great experience! The setting is done well and the communication with the staff is not via intercom or walkie-talkie so you really stay in the game. Loved it!

Great fun. We are a family of 3 with an 11 year old boy. Never heard of escape rooms and had no idea what it would entail. The hour goes by very fast. Super fun, highly recommend. We look forward to our trying to escape another room.
Go go go. We was 4 friends and was amazing. The Room is great and not easyThe man room is nice, show us after we finished some things inside the room.
Escaped from 'wake up'. It was a very nice escape room ! Cool puzzles with a nice level of difficulty! We had a great afternoon! We'll be back to do the other room in the near future :-)

Great fun and amazing people. We had an amazing experience here yesterday evening. First of all, they treated us incredibly well, some of the group members had problems commuting and when I called Claustrophobia they automatically solved my problems and I was able to relax a bit. Not only they are very polite but they really went out of their way to accommodate our needs. The entire experience was great and I would definitely recommend it, you won't regret it and trust me you will be very well taken care of. We played the Arcade room, so we still have to go back for the Wake Up one.

Fantastic fun!. We came to visit the escape room on Monday 18/07/16 as a group of four (two couples) in our mid to late 20's, we chose to play Wake up. We had read reviews on here previous to going and they seemed great which was what made us book. One member of our group had done an escape room previously but the rest of us had no clue what we were letting ourselves in for! We absolutely loved it, it was so clever and interactive. We would highly recommend to everyone, it would be a great way to get to know people and also a fantastic work team building idea. We are already planning a trip to another one back in the UK.

Great way to spend an hour or two in Amsterdam. We had never done an escape room before, but absolutely loved it! We did the "Wake Up" room and found it challenging enough to keep 4 people in their late 30s entertained.
Great room!. This escape-room was lots of fun. Some puzzles were real 'mindbenders'! We played Wake Up; can't wait to try the other room!

Mind blown - so clever, SO MUCH FUN. I've never done an escape room before, but did the Wake Up! room with three friends and escaped in 43 mins! Online booking was easy and we were taken straight through to the room on arrival. The puzzles were extremely well thought-out, with just the right level of difficulty, requiring you to think logically, but not impossible. The atmosphere of the room was perfect with dimming lights and creepy music so you really get into the "nightmare" theme! Definitely would recommend for anyone who likes puzzles :D

SOOO MUCH FUN!!. Did the 90s arcade room with 4 friends. Had a lot of fun, I have done escape rooms before but my friends had not. we had a great time exploring the rooms and had there been time and space we probably would have booked the second room. 90s arcarde was awesome. would recommend to everyone.
So well organised, great fun. The first time any of us did an escape room, it was so much fun, the staff were very helpful and friendly. I highly recommend this as a daytime activity with your group.

So much fun!!! Really worth trying!. I was in Amsterdam for a long-weekend together with 3 of my girlfriends. We tried another Escape room, but did not manage to get out and were a bit annoyed that we did not get to know how far we got, if we were close or not. Therefore we figured we wanted to try another room and went for Wake up at Escape Room Claustrophobia. It was sooo much fun! So many varieties of tasks and you really have to think outside the box! Really exiting! We managed to get out in about 50 minutes! A really fun room which I would recommend everyone to try!

Amazing Experience. We booked the Matilda's room experience in the morning, a group of four friends. It was a great team building experience and a lot of fun! Totally different to anything we had ever done before.We loved it so much we came back and did the Arcade room in the evening which was also brilliant. Really enjoyed both games and would definitely go back if you make another room to play in if we are ever in Amsterdam again!Such a fun and unique experience, thanks very much!
was amazing. By far one ofthe best attractions we had inamsterdam.very very very recommended.great for all groups, families, friends etc.
Excellent games. My family and I have played over 75 games and both games at this location were easily in our top 10 best games ever.

A must-try for everyone! . I have always wanted to try an escape room game, and as me and my husband had a little spare time on the last day of our Amsterdam trip I made the effort to book one for while we were there. Both of us are very experienced gamers (tabletop and video), but neither of us had ever done something like this before. The host (I'm sorry I've forgotten your name, but you were lovely!) was absolutely brilliant and gave us an intro as well as drinks and biscuits. We did the Wake Up! Room and As soon as the game started I immediately knew YES I LOVE IT THIS IS MY JAM as I love old school point & click/mystery games. The whole room was excellently put together, the puzzles were of a perfect level difficulty, and there were surprises that cropped up that were SO satisfying! In the instances we got a little stuck, our host was able to offer hints (though this didn't interrupt the game at all) and by the end, when we finally emerged, we were both pumped with adrenaline (and quite sweaty, haha)! Next time we visit Amsterdam we will definitely be trying the other room - I can't recommend these guys enough. Thanks so much for a super fun morning. :D

AMAZING!. We had an AMAZING time here at Claustrophobia. We came here with four of us a for a team outing and our manager surprised us by not telling us anything! We got into the room, and it was surprise after surprise. The puzzles are well thought out and very challenging! They definitely require team work! The production is amazing as they have handcrafted everything themselves! Super cool, highly recommended to everybody. Thank you so much for an amazing time!

10/10 would recommend. I'm quite familiar with escape rooms, but this went and topped them all. The actual gameplay was incredible, the concept worked so, so well. The staff were lovely (big shoutout to the gal from Sheffield whose name I have very sadly forgotten!). Honestly, just do it. You won't regret it in the slightest!

Wakeup Matilda!. My wife and I booked this room after reading many reviews on many room in Amsterdam. It is our second room ever and it was great !! The puzzles were well pland. The stuff are amazing people and they did the experience even more great !! All the five starts are to them
Really fun escape room. We did the "Wake up" experience and It was a great room where everything was really neatly connected and really fun. Hoping to come back in the future and try the other room.

For escape room lovers everywhere! . We recently played "Wake up" from a recommendation from friends and we're so glad we did as it was one of the best escape room experiences we have ever played! You can tell the creators have a keen eye for detail and technology! We have played quite a lot of escape rooms and this one kept surprising us! If you are in Amsterdam and think you know what escape rooms are like then definitely play this one.. It'll change your whole perception of the experience and leave you wanting to play all over again!Shout out to Daisy who was our game operator - thanks for the clues, we wouldn't have made it out without ya!

Fantastic!. Tried this game for my birthday while visiting Amsterdam, we all had such a great time and I can't recommend it highly enough! There were four of us, none of us had done anything like this before....Through teamwork we managed to "escape" with a few minutes to spare.....We had no idea what to expect but the whole experience from start to finish was brilliant....The hosts were very welcoming and got us really interested in the story of the game.....Having never played anything like this before we were very glad to complete and after enjoying it so much we are looking out for something similar closer to home....

First time completing an Escape Room game- Loved it!!!. My sister decided she wanted to try an escape room for her Birthday celebrations whilst in Amsterdam. We'd all played the equivalent computer games a few times but never completed an actual escape room game like this. We weren't really sure what to expect but all four of us really enjoyed it and said it was the most enjoyable thing we did on our short break to Amsterdam!We did the Wake up game which we completed it with a few minutes spare (which we were pretty pleased with!). It was challenging but not too much so. Everyone in the team had the chance to be involved. The story telling was very good and added to the enjoyment of the game. The room and the challenges were very well designed. I would highly recommend this escape room.We absolutely loved our experience of this escape room- thank-you!

Absolutely incredible! . Me and my girlfriend booked both the Arcade Invasion and Wake Up. Today we played the Arcade Invasion and it was absolutely amazing!First of all the staff. The woman that welcomed us was very pleasant and professional. The introduction for the room was really fun (no spoilers but the story is cool).I won't share any details about the room itself, other than to say that a lot of effort was put into building an experience, and that it was an extremely good one. Teamwork was essential and fun.If you're visiting Amsterdam I highly recommend visiting. We had a lot of fun and it was a great opening for our trip.

A COOL WORKOUT FOR YOUR BRAIN. My friends and I visited the Arcade Invasion room. Three of us are regular escape room goers and this room is one of the best experiences we've had. The puzzles were highly logical and well thought-over by the creators. A very interactive room which is full of different cool devices and this makes this room stand out among many others. Definitely advise anyone in Amsterdam to hop in.

Amazing escape room . This escape room is amazing, First met us very kind women and served us with coffee and some biscuits,After a short a introduction of the room we entered.The missions are difficult and very interesting, the kind you proud of yourself after solving. The hints were very helpful and were given when you really need it.

Amazing room with great riddles - highly recommended. My girlfriend and I did the Wake Up room - it is a great room, disgned carefully, looks beautifully and the riddles are great - intruiging and challanging. We enjoyed it very much.

Bachelor Party with both rooms. We went to Claustrophobia on 11th of June with 7 guys. 4 did Arcade Invasion and 3 did Wake Up!3 of us did Escape games before and they did Arcade Invasion +1 guy as we were told that it is more sophisticated than Wake Up.I can only speak for Wake Up as I was in this team:The design of the room was fantastic. We managed some puzzles quite quick while it took us significant amount of time to do others. We always got enough hints (sometimes from the gamemaster) to progess in the game and it had more to offer than you might first think. In the end we managed to get out with a bit extra time (3 or 4 minutes).The Arcade Invasion Team won their game as well with 2 or 3 minutes left.After playing the game both teams only exchanged words how cool their escape game has been. I have no chance to compare myself, but the 3 guys who did escape games before said that the quaility is top notch and better than the rooms they did before.The price seemed a bit high at first, but seeing the effort put into the rooms the money has been very good invested.When I come back to Amsterdam I would love to do Arcade Invasion.

Very fun escape room . I went here with 8 people of work. I thought it would be good for the teamwork, and it did! We splitted in 2 groups 4 and 4. The staff was very kindly and offer is something to drink. First we relaxed a little bit and after 15 min it was time. I did the arcade version, it was so fun. Good special effects and nice sounds. I recommend every one to play escape room here!

Great fun!. We have never been to an escape room before so like the other reviewers, I had no idea what to expect. The location was pretty easy to find and the hostess (Aurora) was adorable. The clues varied in difficulty, so some were more challenging than others. If you are having trouble, they give you clues so no worries on just getting stuck. Great fun and I recommend!

Amazing room!. I recomend this room for beginners. The ambient is incredible, a lot of colors, shapes, sounds. Each detail was acurately well defined. And the work behind the room was heavy. We enjoy this room like childs

Very original: arcade invasion. Truly a great escape room, because there are many technical and digital tricks in this room, which make this room very original. You can see that the builders of this room thought of everything.

Best birthday present ever...... ....said our 14 year old daughter! We were a group of 2 adults and 2 teenagers for our first escape room experience and Claustrophobia did not disappoint. Once one of the girls figured out the first clue we were off. A great combination of riddles and tasks and a good storyline. Can't wait to try another great one!

Great experience, highly recommended!. My husband and myself did this escape room on our latest visit to Amsterdam and it was very cool. We both did escape rooms before (in Israel) and I think this was one of the best. The puzzles were challenging and the story and atmosphere were very realistic, which I really liked. Overall, we both would definitely recommend it.

Fun. Was very interesting room with great riddles, built to make you suspect everything :)
Had a great time, awesome room!
Our first escape room - great experience. We never did an escape room before, but this is a great one to start with. Puzzles are diverse and there is a surprise around every corner.

First experience in escape room was not a let down. I had a short break with my 15 year old son and asked him what he would like to do in Amsterdam- fortunately he suggested escape rooms as an idea.Neither of us had completed one before so was a little worried we would not be able to enjoy as a small group of two.No need to worry, the claustrophobia was spot on, cannot say too much obviously but the puzzles/riddles were tough but always achievable- helpful tips given if really stuck.Work as a team would be my tip.The biggest compliment I can give is 60 minutes passed by in a ridiculously quick time, non stop rush, loved it- go on book it- you will be telling all you pals about it for weeks
Original. A lot of thought was invested in this room.The theme is great, puzzles are unique and original.Over all, one of the best rooms we've been at
Brilliant!. Would completely recommend this experience. We had so much fun. Paul, who ran it, was really friendly and put you at ease. Haven't stopped talking about it since. Great challenge.

Best Birthday!. I really wanted to do something different and fun for my birthday...rather than the standard get-drunk-and-not-remember-anything experience. And it was the best decision! This was our first escape room and we all came out with huge smiles. It was rewarding, interactive, and cleverly thought out. We felt like kids running around trying to solve the puzzles. I would recommend it for anybody!

First time, didn't disappoint!. This was our first experience with escape rooms (for all four people that attended), and as a direct result of our time here it hasn't been our last! The staff was extremely friendly and accommodating, and the set up of the room was exciting and fun for everyone on our team. We had a great time, and would highly recommend Claustrophobia to anyone!

Matilda's room. Absolutely great! Me and my friends had so much fun solving tricky riddles, we had shivers! It was our first escpe room and now we want more, very creative idea! I definitely recommend it :)
Amazingly exciting. It was beyond our expectations. Very good set up. We talked about this night over and over, that's how much we liked it. Nice staff
Intrigue, mistery and fun!. it offers much more than you would have expected from a scape room, and guessing the way out wasnt that easy.

Had a great time!. Great game, clever, challenging and brilliantly designed.
The staff is very nice and helpful.
Definitely a must!

Something different than a day to the zoo. For our 3-year anniversary, my boyfriend did the escape room quest to celebrate. It was even more fun than expected! The game is challenging, not too easy. Aurora is lovely; she makes sure you are well taken care of and gives a good introduction to the game. We are definitely coming back when there's a new theme. It was well worth the money.
Great time!. We got there with no Knowledge about what gonna happen, then the attendant was very kind and explain the game for us!Was a great time, really nice experience!

Sure worth to try . Nice people, great game and very interesting, you will never feel it till you try it, reviews and pictures never reflect how goof the game is, once you go in and try you will love it and you wont regret.

One of the best in Europe!. I've been playing at almost 30 escape rooms arround Europe and this Wake Up Game is one of the best. Story, atmosphere, games, room set up... I trully recommend to play one of the escape room jewels in Europe.Congrats guys! Pablo from The Rombo Code escape room in Madrid

Fantastic 21st!. We booked this as part of my 21st in a group of 4 friends, and had no idea what to expect. I had just read so many good reviews so thought I would try it out myself. Such great fun and laughter we had, and definitely worth it! Would recommend going as a group of 4!

Best in Amsterdam!. In total we've played up to 30 games all over, 3 of which in Amsterdam, and this one was our favourite and is in our top 3 of all time! So much atmosphere, fantastic games, very friendly host. Such a unique experience should not be missed!
So Much Fun!!. We really enjoyed this, such a different experience. The staff were so friendly. We would highly recommend it but move fast people the time flies! ;) Worth every penny xxx #melorney

Escaped. Mathilda's room was my first time in an Escape Room, and it was brilliant fun. Claustrophobia has created a good atmosphere, and the challenges requires a fair bit of brain work and communication with your team. We got out in just under 50 minutes, so 9 more minutes worth of puzzles would have been even better to get even more fun from the experience. :) Recommend a visit! Also - we stayed back to enjoy a few beers and watch our friends lose to us, which was nice. But remember - the door is not sound proof, and apparently they could hear us asking "why don't they see that" and such, so hush!

Absolutely Top Notch!. I visited with two other escape room enthusiasts and we all agreed that this was the best escape room we have ever done!Everything was executed brilliantly, the host was friendly and engaging and introduced the room well. Once we got in the room all of the puzzles were very clever and the story and setting were very believable as well as beautifully made!All in all we had a great time and if you are only going to do one escape room this year make it this one!

awesome. This was a first. I took my kids, both mid twenties, there. You hand in your cell phones, lock you up in a room for an hour while you solve puzzles to get out. It was great to do this a an adult family. Getting together and solving problems. Very well done.

An hour well spent. We arrived in Amsterdam and grabbed a coffee before heading over to Claustrophobia. Wasn't sure what to expect but the host explained the concept and set the scene before we entered. Was not disappointed. It was challenging and fun for the 2 of us and we managed to escape with 3:13 on the clock. I believe they are creating another room so we would love to do that on our next trip to Amsterdam!
Fantastic experience. First experience of escape rooms. Family had a great time. Staff very helpful and friendly. Would thoroughly recommend

Brilliant Fun. Just finished this Escape Room and it was brilliant. Never done an experience like this before but would definitely do it again. Had so much fun and it was pretty difficult which kept the whole team busy for the full hour. Really enjoyed it and would recommend to anyone and everyone...
Wake up. Whilst I enjoyed the event I felt more clues would have helped in completing the task. Also the final room we were in I did not entirely understand.

Logic thinking to the max. This escaperoom was fantastic. I really liked the original ways to solve things. This room is very mechanic which I really liked. I don't think it was scary. Nice host. I can really recommend this room!

Wow, amazing fun!. Amazing fun! Shocks and surprises galore, the puzzles were tricky but not too testing and we managed to escape with only a few minutes to spare. Great for families with teenagers or older children looking for a bit of excitement in Amsterdam. Our host was very friendly and spoke good English. An absolutely mind blowing experience!
So much fun with friends!. It was my first escape room and it was great! I couldn't have ended it without my three other friends. Now I just wanna try some other ones!!

Unexpected. First experience with escape rooms, and the bar is set extremely high for the others: we had awesome experience! Friendly and funny host and much fun during the game! Adrenaline and "wow" effects are guaranteed.

One of the best. We had a really fun time trying to get out of this one! It was just the two of us, and the puzzles were so much more than the normal combination locks.The host was nice and the overall experience was super!
Slick & Fun. Well thought out, friendly staff and most importantly really good fun! Would recommend to anyone looking to do something to break up the day in Amstersam!
That was great and we saved Matilda!!!. Amazing and very interesting Escape room with many elements need to be solved! Go there and you won't regret!!!
Fun!. It is nice! Really a challenge for the whole family. Everybody's input is necessary. A couple of shocks make it even more fun!
First timers. Fabulous, really took us out on a search for clues to rescue the little girl, highly recommended, team of four is optimal, and don't take in any preconceptions
Exciting, nice experience. Great experience, first time in an escape room, I definitely will recommend it to anyone, nice game to work together with friends or colleagues

Interesting story!. An introduction to the story, and your part in the story is given prior to entering the actual room. The story is good, and its fun to see it unfold during your stay. The game challenges both logic and creativity.We was five people in our group, but i would recommend others to be fewer so everyone can take a bigger part in the challenges. Overall, an excellent experience!

A Nice Break From Typical Tourist Activities. This was mine and my girlfriend's first escape room and we absolutely loved it! The staff was very welcoming and provided a great atmosphere for the game. As for the game itself, it was challenging and engaging, and an incredible amount of fun. I highly recommend booking a reservation, it is a very rewarding experience and offers a nice respite from just walking around the city or museums all day.
Ryan Shaw . It was really cool and fun didn't know what to expect as it was our first one but makes us so keen to try more

EPIC. My friends and I visited the escape room just after landing in Amsterdam, and it was the first one we'd ever done so wasn't sure what to expect! The staff were friendly and helpful and the game itself was great fun! Would highly recommend and can't wait for the next one!

Amazing !. Me and my girlfriend done claustrophobia while we were in Amsterdam for the weekend. I can honestly say I didn't know what to expect but it was brilliant so much fun and so unpredictable. We have already recommended this to so many of our friends and family.

Heaps of fun. That was our first escape room and it was really a lot of fun!
I didnt know what to expect but I would def recommend it!
Try it

One of the BEST of the 30+ rooms we have done this trip.. We are starting our own rooms in California, This is one of the rooms that just works so well. The flow of the room, the designs of the room and all the puzzles were great. Visually excellent, the entire rooms stays in the theme of the room. Everything is very logical but not too easy. All the puzzles made sense which in some Escape rooms you have a hard time trying to understand why or how the puzzle is in that room. I heard they are opening a new one they have been working on for a year..... If it is anything like this one, I'd come back for it in a heart beat.
Absolutely loved it.. It was just brilliant from start to finish. We loved it and would 100% recommend the experience. Can't wait until they open another!
Best escape room ever!. Great room! So much fun! The story, the riddles, the vibe - everything was perfect. Very recommended!

Awesome!. This was the first time me or my partner had tried something like this, and I've got to say it was fantastic. We had a good brief beforehand, not giving too much away, and then went straight in, it's so different to the usual things we would do on a city break. Fun and challenging, I would recommend this place to anybody, well worth the money! Thanks for a great experience, and we will definitely try the new room if we are back in Amsterdam!
Best escapse room ever. Must must must escapse room..Very challenging and technology,A bit scary We finished the room with 58 minutes...Try it!! Lovely staff

Loved it!!. It was my first escape room, and I loved every second of it! A friend of mine who already visited several escape rooms advised me to go to Claustrophobia, as she said it was the best one she had visited so far. I'm really glad I followed up on her advice, because it was a great experience. The hosts were really nice, and the story was easy to relate to. Scary and fun at the same time. The riddles became more difficult to solve as we came further into the game. I would recommend it to everyone!

Great room! . We were a group of four and it was our third room. It was the best room we were the tasks were so clever and planned very well. The room itself was very impressive and unexpected. We came out after 50 minutes and were very happy. The operator was very nice. If you in amsterdam go and have fun!
The best escape room in my life. Everything was interactive! nice music and picture ! good experience for every traveler who needs adventure !

Disappointed with customer service. Booked Escape Room for new years eve as we were travelling to Amsterdam on a cruise. We booked at 6.46pm on the 29th December. On the morning of new years eve our ship announced that we were not going to make it to Amsterdam due to weather conditions. We phoned to cancel and were told (twice) that a refund would be processed. The Escape Room are now disputing saying this and say that the cancellation must be made 48 hours prior to the game. We only booked the game 43 hours in advance and the confirmation email clearly states "Note that it is possible to cancel the game on the website using your Claustrophobia account, or by calling us at ......". We were really looking forward to our game in Escape Room but their customer service is clearly lacking.

Bad customer service. Extremely disappointed. We were very excited to visit after reading all of the fantastic reviews. Booked online on 29th Dec for 31st Dec. Unfortunately our cruise ship failed to dock at Amsterdam due to unexpected bad weather so I called to cancel on the morning of 31st Dec. I was promised a refund by the lady on the phone. Refund never received. Emailed to follow up and have been told that I was not promised a refund!!! I'm not a liar, I'm a good person, hence why I went to the effort of calling to cancel! I'm 100% certain that I was promised a refund as I even asked the lady on the phone to re-confirm this, which she did. I have emailed several times and now I'm being ignored. I was kindly offered a discount on a future visit but this doesn't help as I live in the U.K. I was told by the person who responded to the email that their cancellation policy is 48hrs. How can I cancel within 48hrs when my booking was made less than 48hrs prior?! Also, no mention of this policy on my email confirmation nor during my phone conversation when I called to cancel. I deserve the refund I was very clearly promised. Appalling customer service. I'm hoping this post might prompt them to stop ignoring my emails and provide the refund that they owe me.

Smart and well thought escape room. This escape room in the heart of Amsterdam is one of the best I have been! It is brilliant, well thought and full of fun and surprises. The state of the art techology of the room combined with the smart puzzles make this experience unique! We were a group of 4 people and we managed to escape the room in 40min.Highly recommended!
Amazing experience!. Had the best time ever here at Claustrophobia! So different to anything I've ever done before. Would highly recommend!!

Amazing!!!!. Me and my boyfriend heard about the escape rooms and thought we would give it a go... It was One of the most exciting things we have done! Heart racing fun!! Such a good experience.. And we managed to escape on time!:) 100% recommend to anyone either a couple or a group.

Wonderful escape experience!. it was my first escape experience and it was perfect! the staff was friendly. one of our friends was late because of the traffic and the lady allowed us to postpone the game for one hour. the riddles were delicately designed. the hints were just in time to help! we escaped with 10 sec to spare... Looking forward to their next room!
1st escape room experience - now I want more!. Awesome setup, technically very well made. Cool sound and special effects. Challenging riddles. Can't wait for the 2nd room to open!

Great fun for all the family. We took or children aged 7, 9 and 11. A definite highlight of our Amsterdam weekend. Managed to escape with minutes to spare (with a little help along the way). Very cleverly put together. If you're thinking of doing it .... DO IT!

Escape the dream. It was my first time playing a "realtime" escape game and it was absolutely overwhelming. The tasks you had to fulfil were not quite easy but not too hard. We were in there in a team of 3 people and we managed to get out within an hour. The setting is in a very good condition, the people who work there are absolutely friendly and the story is just great!
Excellent. We've had the best time. Very good flow to the room with different chalanges. It looked simple at first but they've set a high bar.

AMAZing!. Having done an Escape Room in London before I thought I had a pretty good idea what to expect, however this experience was so much better!! I would recommend this experience to everyone who is thinking off doing one in Amsterdam. Escape Rooms are a great concept in general, but Claustrophobia has definitely got an edge without spoiling what the storyline is, there is great imagination behind it with just the right touch of spooky. Looking forward to the new room opening, will definitely be considering another trip to Amsterdam when it opens!

Best Escapegame I've been to. Best Escapegame I've been to so far. Great story, good and difficult riddles, scary and imaginative. Very friendly host. Will definately come back when there is a new room.

Best Escape Room in Amsterdam. We did 10 escape rooms over the course of a weekend visit. Not only was this clearly the best room in our opinion, several of the other rooms we visited referred to it as the #1 room. Friendly owners, good theme, high production values, different puzzle ideas and good atmospherics. Maybe could have been improved by a slightly different hint system, but that is just trying to find something to be more balanced. All in all a top escape room.
First time here. . On a stag do and decided to go here after a quick look on trip advisor and it ended being a lot better than thought, definitely going to have look for more now.

WOW. We were 3 friends just doing the weekend in Amsterdam and decided to go to an escape room spontaneously.The minute we entered we were offered coffee, tea, delicious cookies and the girl hosting was SUPER nice.The room itself was difficult and fun (and a bit scary :) ).Everything worked flawlessly.If you like escape rooms and you are in Amsterdam, I totally recommend going here.

Its Better Than You Think, Remember There Is No " I " In " TEAM ". If you want to challenge yourself and your friends then this place is a must visit.If you do not work as a team you will not succeed.
Great room!. It was my third room, definitely the best one so far. Really good design and puzzles, they get you into the story mood alright...
Great place. My friends and I had a great time at claustrophobia. Honesty couldn't recommend it enough! It's a great break from sight seeing and roaming around Amsterdam! And a great value for money.
AWESOME!!. An experience you'll never forget! A little bit creepy now and then.. But too much fun. We had a blast!!!!
Epic experience. I've done escape rooms with friends before but this one was by far the best I've been to. Great puzzles and great staff

Great family activity!. Prior to visiting Amsterdam, I looked for things for us to do. I came across this activity and decided to try it. My team consisted of myself and my two teens (17 and 13). We had a hard time finding the location as my GPS was leading us in a different location; however, we managed to find it. It's located in an unassuming neighborhood that looks like an ordinary building. They were gracious enough to start book a round for us even though we were there after the normal start time. As we had never played a game like this before, the concept was explained to us and in we went. It was a little creepy but nothing overly frightening or scary. It took us a while to pull together and get through the clues but in the end, we were able to get better at playing together to achieve our common goal (getting out of the room). We had a lot of fun playing this game.

Adventure time!. If your'e doubting. Just go! It's fantastic! We haven't had that much fun in a ages! The adventure, surprises, intrigue and just fun involved is completely worthwhile! And it's challenging. It took our group the full hour (and a 1 minute bonus time) to complete! It will challenge you in every way. Creative thinking, logical thinking and teamwork! Real treat for everyone! So what are you waiting for! Go reserve a date!

Great way to spend an hour. We played as a group of 4 friends. We had never played an escape game before. Claustrophobic had a good story was challenging and well thought out with lots of twists. We had a great time and will be trying another escape the room game soon, I hope it can live up to this one!
Awesome!. Very nice escape room with an interesting little story behind all the puzzles. The excellent use of sound and music throughout the entire thing made it an awesome experience.

it was a really fun experience, you jumps into the world of being a detective, mind challenging, exciting, make u feel. it was a really fun experience, you jump into the world of being a detective , mind challenging, exciting, clue by clue you unravel the secrets in this amazing room, so much fun

Go do it now. No spoilers! The theme was fantastic, super creepy and challenging with lots to twists and turns! I would recommend this to anyone. I participated over 4 days ago now and I still cannot get over how much fun we had.

Amazing time! Just book it.. A group of 5 friends booked this as a last minute thing. Was one of the best things we done in Amsterdam over a long weekend. Without ruining the story behind it ..
