I have been to one of these in London and this one was so much better, more in depth and more of an overall story. Would do it again . Highly recommend that any group does this.

Fun story, great puzzles!. Had a great time with a bunch of co-workers! It's the first time I've visited an escape room and it was awesome! The room had a great theme and a couple of unexpected twists, we all got totally caught up in the story! Highly recommended!
Amazing!. STOP READING AND JUST DO IT!!!! I absolutely loved it!!!!! Forced my other half to do it and he got fully involved! Something to remember always!

Top notch game. Awesome experience! I have played more than 15 escape rooms and can say that this one is definitely on the top of my personal list.I was part of a meet-up group and we made it in less than 45 minutes, hooraaay!. Claustrophobia organizes these meet-up games for those who don’t know each other. It’s a good opportunity to meet new people and have fun if all your friends are busy.  The game was very engaging and I totally lost track of time and forgot about everything else. The story develops in a linear way and you don’t get lost trying to figure out what the hell to do next. This is a very important point for me while playing escape rooms.  I would also compliment the room design, highly creative and innovative. Great location, waiting room, the staff is really cool. I highly recommend this place to anyone, be it first-timers or experienced escape room enthusiasts.

Fantastic Experience. Absolutely amazing, myself and three friends decided to book this experience based on the other reviews on tripadvisor. It certainly didn't disappoint, the atmosphere was tense and exciting and really brought out the team spirit within the group! The puzzles were beautifully thought out and I hope to visit again soon!

Team Work. It was an Amazing experience. This is definitely one of the best rooms we have done and it's worth it. The creators of this escape room did an awesome job and really made it challenging but for a purpose.

Intensely fun!. Had a great time at Claustrophobia. From the into story straight to the finish it was a challenging, fun and very immersive experience! Hosts were accommodating and fun people. The escape was diverse and creative - highly recommend giving it a try.

Loved it!. I was with 9 friends, so we split into 2 teams of five and competed to see who could make it out in the fastest time. Tess was an excellent host, and gave us a great introduction without giving away too much. The challenges were very well put together and fun. We really had to work as a team throughout. The tension towards the end was palpable, but we managed to make it out before the hour was up. Really made the weekend for us. Would definitely recommend!

One of the best!. Although I don't have the best track record for escapes, I've played 15 rooms in 5 countries, and consider Claustrophobia's "Wake Up!" among the very best.This room kills the competition in terms of automation and cool mechanisms. It's clear the creators put a TON of effort into the design, and it was so refreshing to have some genuinely surprising actions happen on their own. I find that some newer escape rooms fall back on the boring lock-after-lock-after-lock scenario but "Wake Up" was something unique. The host was very kind, and we would love to go back to Amsterdam see what other cool challenges these guys could put together. (Sadly, we didn't escape. Our last few minutes were some major mental gymnastics! But the host complimented our (husband and wife) communication skills, so I guess that's a win!)
Action packed 60 minutes and endless fun (even for 2 people). From start to finish this was a blast! Can't recommend enough. Very well put together and thought out. Staff very nice too.

Great Fun. Just returned home after visiting this escape room in Amsterdam, we went as a four and completed the room with a minute to spare. Plenty of fun, twists and excitement along the way. Would recommend!!

Great family entertainment. Challenging hours entertainment for family, all thoroughly enjoyed it . Easy to book , central location close to science centre, maritime museum, zoo and resistance museum. Hosted by charming Aurora.

Atmospheric, Unique Escape Room!. My friends and I have done around 7 escape rooms each in several countries in Europe - this was one of the best! Without giving anything away, this was a unique experience that leaves you excited to solve each puzzle you're on because of all the twists along the way. The whole premise of the story was wonderfully crafted with a thrilling atmosphere! Highly recommend 'Wake Up!' You won't be disappointed!

Best escape room in Amaterdam!. This is one of the best rooms I have done so far (wake-up). Really difference and cool and we just made it within the hour! It is close to central station so easy to reach and you get a cup of coffee/tea + chocolates/cookies while the story is being explained.
Great experience of solving riddles. It was a race against the clock, trying to solve a great number of riddles, some really difficult. Also we got some great surprises along the way.

Great atmosphere and super fun experience. Everyone in my 4 people team felt great about the room.The vibe is slightly eerie, but never scary (you could start a couple of times out of surprise though !)Puzzles are very cute, a few ingenious, many tied to the storyline, and all enjoyable.You have time and again the impression magic is happening when you solve a puzzle !Highly recommended

Fun experience. Exciting and challenging experience; this was my first ever escape room and after this I'm quite sure it won't be the last. The puzzles were sometimes a bit tricky to solve but we always kept going and found our way out of the room eventually. Highly recommendable!
Amazing!! Do it!. Great experience! Took my mom and my two little nephews (ages 8, 11). Very interactive, high standards and lots of fun!! Highly recommended

So much fun!. This was awesome, the whole concept of how it all intertwined and having more than one room to figure out how to get into and figure out how to escape! It was very different and so much fun! Every little thing you do has some kind of effect which is very cool! Highly recommended!

Creepy....at the right point!. I have to admit that at first it was like being in your worst nightmare ever... you feel trapped, but as you start to play and solve the games... everything becomes amazingly surreal and fun! This is of course an experience I am going to remember for a long loooong time. Great Escape Room Claustrophobia Amsterdam!!!

Superb 60 minutes!. This was a surprise activity I planned for me and my wife (who loves escape themes) on a short break in Amsterdam. Fortunately Claustrophobia allowed for teams of 2 and I booked us in the last slot of the evening for our very first escape game. Without giving too much away It is an activity that will require lots of communication and different brain skills so it will suit families too.You start with a story that introduces you to the game and then you have 1 hour to play, but make no mistake, unless you are Mensa level clever, the 60 minutes soon become 20 and when you look again only 2 and less. Time flies at warp speeds in here!Very enjoyable and allows for lots of brownie-points scoring with the other half.Fantastic! Thank you to Aurora and the team at Claustrophobia for a superb activity in Amsterdam!
Great fun!. Extremely fun and addicting. The team-gene is brought out for an overhaul - the same for the brain. To be recommended for any occasion.

One of the best spent hours of our lives ;-). This room is a very special one. It’s so genially built and so full of clever tricks it kept on surprising us until the very last minute. A little scary every once in a while, but most of all a lot of fun. Not a typical classic room with locks and vaults, but a unique experience. A room that should be on everyone’s list. Claustrophobia’s Wake Up was my 5th escape and definitely the best one yet. I’m sooo looking forward to your new concept!

Mind Blowing. I loved it! It was my first time experiencing an escape room and I had no idea it would be this much fun. It's a perfect combination of thrills, chills and energetic excitement. Just like the 101 doors game only REAL and a thousand times better!واقعاً عالی بود! یک تجربه ی جدید پر از انرژی و هیجان هم زمان مخلوط با فکر مثل یه معمای زنجیره ای کاملاً واقعی

Great adventure. It was our first escape room and a great adventur! I don't want to spoil too much, but what I can say is that you find a lovely designed room with sooo many details <3 Matilda is waiting for you ;)

Fun, challenging and creepy!. My friends and I had a blast at this escape room. The puzzles were sophisticated and challenging but not impossible. The room had really cool surprises, and the setting, sound effects and decorations created a suitably creepy (but not outright scary) atmosphere.I would definitely recommend this room to anyone.
Team building retreat. The organization was very friendly and helpful for last minute changes. The team enjoyed the activity enormously!
Great escape room!. A fun escape room with great imagination and a good theme. The room used a lot of sensors to unlock boxes and new areas rather then the usual combination padlocks.
Memorable. Helpful and friendly staff. Definitely something we would recommend and gave a memorable end to our holiday!

You won't regret it!. It was so much fun, very well organised and thought through. Very kind and friendly personnel. I loved it, if you are searching for something new and fun to do with your friends or partners, this is it :D

Great experiment. It was good at the beginning and kept better and better. it's a different way to spend some quality time with friends. i highly recommend.p.sTess's hospitality was awesome! thank you so much!
Engaging. Challenging. Co operative . I, along with 3 others entered the unknown. The carefully arranged stimulus with the backdrop of time were intense. It was thoroughly worth it.
Hour of great fun. Excellent challenge and very friendly staff. Time went really quickly. Room was full of surprises. Just a little expensive when just two people.

Wow that was fun. My wife and two of our kids (14/11) had an awesome time. It was probably the best thing we did. We all worked together and made it out with an extra 6 minutes. We are hooked and will do this type of thing on all our vacations.
Imaginative and fun. Great fun, best Escape room in Amsterdam we did so far. Really makes you think out of box. Loved the atmosphere.

Amazing escape room :). The room is really really nice, the theme suits the room and is really well done. Great job! Besides I had an special gift and so I needed help and they were as helpful as it gets, I hope I can go back to the new room!

Logically entertaining. We were with 2 persons to solve the problems to escape. We were firsttimers. With a little help from the clues, we worked it out just in time. We totally didn't know what to espect. So we were a little paralized before starting. I didn't get that some people almost made it out, until we did (and almost didn't). It gave a few nice surprises. We don't think it would have been good for our nine year old daughter, because the ambiance with the music and other small surprises and the lighting are a little spooky. I was spooked myself from the noice the moment we got out. If your child isn't easily spooked, definately bring him or her, because some parts are probably easier with the logic of a child. Keep comunicating with eachother. It helped us escape. I'm definately hooked now! They are building a second room.... Nice guidance. I forgot my bracelet inside and they called me straight away. I had a very lovely 40th birthday doing this escape room.

Time flies when having fun. This was our first escape room experience. With my wife and daughter we spend the full time to escape, but every second was worth it. It requires communication and collaboration so only a team can do it. It's great how the whole story fits together. Go for it!
Great Experience!. We have really enjoyed this room! We liked the story, the setting and the challenge. This is the best room we have been to.

LOVED every second!. My first experience in a real escape room! Went with other expats and met some lovely people, staff make you feel right at home with a smile. The room is amazing, we got out with 5 minutes to spare. So much fun, can't wait to play another. Thank you so much for an excellent time.
was really fun. The storyline is awesome. the quest isnt too hard nor too easy. was really fun. the staff are awesome as well. I enjoyed every second of it

A very exiting adventure for young and old. Excellent for family parties etc... We, 2 boys of 11 and 12 years old and the father of one of the boys, have been in "The Room" on a trip to Amsterdam. All 3 of us have experienced the "thrill" and "excitement" of the game already after a few minutes. It does keep you as a team for an hour very busy and once we finally found the last correct answer we have been proud for hours !The game is a winner ! The game-assistent and his explanation was very good and very friendly. His coffee and other drinks were also a positive surprise! We recommend this house to everyone!

Unique idea, great realisation. A very original approach to the escape room genre, I'd recommend for anyone! Very well thought up set-up, everything automated, great mood setting (music, lights) and a complex yet cursive scenario. Not too many puzzles involving numbers and math, more having to do with logic, intuition and originality!

SO much fun!. Went here with my boyfriend, dad and his girlfriend. We had got there before opening time but the man inside let us come in early. He got us some water and biscuits and sat us down to explain the story and what we needed to do, he was very pleasant and helpful. Once we got inside, it was SO much fun working out all the different puzzles and realising how well you can work as a team! We managed to finish it in just 43 minutes! Which apparently only 30% finish early! I would DEFINITELY recommend this to anyone visiting Amsterdam, just SO much fun and wasn't too easy or to hard.

Very authentic))). It is a very nice room. I played before rooms with such theme but this one is the first where the everything is in place. Storyline is very good. The whole room is done very thoughtfully and with great imagination. It is pretty challenging and I guess would be more fun for experienced players. I think somehow it is one of its kind. Riddles are nice and require different types of logic.

Great fun. Had a really fun time with my partner, was quirky and magical! Been to escape games in London before and this was our favourite so far! Not too much help but a little hint whenever needed. Really lovely and enthusiastic staff, really recommend this place as something different to do in Amsterdam!
Small but strong story. If u like escape rooms... This will satisfy you. Small room with simple elements but a strong story.
Matilda. Never been to an escape room before. Our one was abit creepy but it was a lot of fun and will definitely try another escape room
Fabulous!. So much fun and something different to do in Amsterdam. Did it in a couple and we really enjoyed escaping together. Definitely worth doing 100%.

60 minutes is not long enough!!!!!!!!. Awesome Escape Room ! Really the best one I have done so far. It has it all: mistery, creativity, thinking outside de box, originality, complexity and great fun! Strongly recommended!

Awesome!!. We went to Claustrophobia with a group of friends. It was our first experience with an escape room and we did not know what to expect. The room blew our mind and we had so much fun!! I can reccomend this room to everyone, wether you are with friends, collegues or family.
Really good escape room!. A really good moment between friends or in family with a nice staff :) I recommend this escape without a doubt!
very nice experience. We had a great time in matilda's room! Very impressive experience. Would recommend for sure to people who want to spend time in amsterdam in a fun and original way.

Great first escape room. We really enjoyed our first escape room. Friendly staff and an excellent 'room'. We worked well together to escape with time to spare. May have to go back to try out their upcoming second Mario themed room.

Awesome teambuilding experience!. Went here for a teambuilding activity and it was great! We were 5 people, even though they recommend being 2-4 players, 5 players worked great.The tasks were clever and exciting, especially when you figure out exactly how to do them. Looking forward to the opening of the next room!

Go for it and Enjoy!. My daughter said "OMG", an experience she did not expect. With two teenage kids and two adults we felt like we were on a movie set, where all other earthly things were far away. Great, doable riddles, some creepy music and sounds to add to the enclosed atmosphere. First timer or not, you should go for it and enjoy this very nice escape room.

Challenging. If you didn't try a riddleroom before, that's a good one to start. it's challenging, the atmosphere is cool. The riddles are logically complicated, not just artificially complicated. They use some technology: everything is automatic. Just go with friends, family or partner. Second best riddleroom in amsterdam.
Great experience for the first time. It was the first time for us !! We had a lot of fun, cant wait for the next room =) thank you guys for a great experience !!

Wake up! - Escape room in Claustrophobia. We had great fun in the room. Immersing atmosphere (with the interior, music and sound effects), good puzzles, and some unexpected moments. Well recommanded for everybody.
Grate teambuilding. Grate teambuilding. Could be run in different languages. Incl. Swedish. Det var underbart!!! Hope it will be new game soon...

Excellent Experience. My husband and children (10, 11 & 13 yrs) had the most amazing time at Claustrophobia trying to escape from Matilda's bedroom. The whole experience was completely absorbing for them, super fun and it was so incredible to see them work so well as a team. They all say it was the best part of our Amsterdam trip. Definitely a fantastic family fun- so different and exciting. Our kids loved thinking outside the box! The staff were very friendly and professional- super impressed. It isn't a scary for children.... Perhaps just mildly creepy in parts. We would recommend this to any family with school age kids. Looking forward to returning one day!

A must do with friends! . Just finished this escape room with a couple of friends, and we were all more than happy that this was our first escape room, because it definitely set the bar at a high level. Zina, the girl who runs the rooms, has put great effort into every detail, and the result is amazing - you are actually required to use your brain and solve puzzles rather than look under each object if something is hidden there. We managed to escape on time, but it was a good challenge! Recommended for 2-4 people. I wish I could erase my memory and do it again! A new room will be added soon at the same location.

Amazing!. I visited Claustrophobia couple of weeks ago with my 3 friends and it was one of the most memorable experiences! It is a great way to spend time with your friends, challenge yourself and really work as a team. The employees in Claustrophobia are super nice and friendly, who made us feel welcomed!I really recommend this escape room to everyone who would like to try something new and different and spend some nice time quality times with your friends or family.
First Escape Room Experience - Great Start. Hi - this was my first escape room and it was incredibly fun. A 2nd room is in planning and I can't wait to see it!
Loved the room!. I have been to a few of these but this was really fun and I had a blast. It the best or one of the bests in Amsterdam.

Amazing!. This experience is fun, entertaining and just amazing! Take your best friends with you an have a great time solving puzzles! Staff is easy going and lovely to talk to. Every penny spent on in was definitely worth it and I encourage everyone visiting Amsterdam to book a game with Claustrophobia. Have fun!
Great. Best spent 90 minutes in amsterdam. Clever , fun although we didn't succeed solving the problem. deff worth going

A clever, surprising and engaging game. My newlywed wife and I did this while visiting Amsterdam. My engineer nerd brain was kept happy putting together clues and experimenting with ideas for the quite creative and challenging game flow to learn as we went. Bring an open mind and have a good time working with or competing against friends for the fastest time to solve it :-)Though the price is a little steep IMO when playing with 2 people (4 would be the same price and better value), the game was fun and winnable with 2 observant people.

A very engaging experience. This was the first escape room I ever tried. It was challenging but very entertaining. The atmosphere was well built and the riddles were various and unpredictabile. The assistance was measured and precise.The staff was very professional and nice.

Just brilliant! So much fun. My boyfriend and I saw the reviews on trip advisor and thought we would see what it's all about...well its just simply brilliant! Not at all what I was imagining...way way better. They need to bring this to the UK! It's great, getting you to work together, communicate, have fun and beat the clock. Don't hesitate, book now! Something you will never forget.Thanks claustrophobia...Andria & Lee

Amazing time. Accidentally stumbled across the Escape Room and was very happy I went inside. The instructor was very good at explaining all the details and seemed to be very excited for us to join the activity which made it all the more exciting for us.I thought I was about to make it out of the room however once I thought I won with 20 seconds left another door opened! I wish I had more time but the instructor was nice enough to show us the last room. I was very impressed but just wish time was on my side.If I return to Amsterdam I will check out their new room which is under construction Highly recommend to anyone looking for fun

Exciting and different to typical escape rooms. We loooved claustrophobia! We have done a few escape rooms in 3 different countries and this one was the most exciting so far! It is different to other rooms in the sense that everything is done automatically; you interact with objects in the room to trigger the next puzzle, you're not just looking for keys to open locks, which makes it more challenging but fun and imaginative at the same time. It's good for 2 people too. We'll be going back for the new room!
Best hour in Amsterdam. This was so much fun! If you are in Amsterdam you should definitely find one hour to spend it here. Totally worth it! It is different and entertaining.
Try it. We had so much fun doing this! Great place, it was the first time we visited an escaperoom. I really recommend this to everybody, just visit this place you will not be disappointed

Worth every penny - SO much fun!. My boyfriend and I had never done an escape room before, and this was one of the escape games that accepted 2 people to play. We had no idea what to expect going into it, and we were absolutely thrilled with the whole game! It was so much fun and the time flew by. The game was exciting, challenging, thought provoking, and most of all fun. You should absolutely do this if you're interested in something new, exciting, and fun!
Amazing Escape Room!. It was a brilliant adventure to play Escape Room Claustrophobia! Exciting puzzles, surprises etc. A must do when you're addicted to Escape Rooms!

Amazing Room Escape. Very creative, very *different* room escape game that's been created from scratch by an amazing team in Amsterdam!
We had a ton of fun!
One of the staff members hinted that there will soon be a Nintendo/Super Mario themed room escape! We will definitely come back for that ;D

Fantastic fun. We went in August, just 2 of us which made it a little more difficult but had a lot of fun. Rally recommend it for someone / groups that like to be challenged and enjoy a good puzzle/riddle to work out.

Very challenging room, good location, friendly staff. We had an amazing time! This room is really challenging and the theme was cool! The staff is also friendly. The location is only 10 minutes by foot away from the Central station, so that's perfect. I would really recommend Claustrophobia. When they have their new room openend, we will definitely come back!

One of the most unique and fun things I've ever done!. I had no idea what to expect at all, but the experience was better than I could have ever imagined. We had a great time and it was definitely worth the money. The time flew by and it was interesting to see the different strengths that each of my friends had (we were four people all together), which helped us ultimately escape the room. This is definitely something that should be experienced at least once in a lifetime, and it was one of the top ten most unique experiences of my life. Try it out!

Totalling engaging!. My family--myself and my husband, age 57, and all three of my grown children ages 23-29, had a blast. Completely different from anything we had done before. Requires everyone's participation. You get some hints to move along with solving the puzzle. Go and try it--you'll be glad you did.
Great fun . Just been there with my girlfriend and we're super stoked about it First time we did something like that and will do it again Thx!

Loved it!. This was my first time doing anything like this and has made me want to do it so much more! The staff were so friendly and chatty and we were explained how to do everything. This room was so interesting (Wake up) and so hard but fun! In the end we didn't pass but only had three things to do. If I went back I would definitely do their other room!

AWESOME. They let us play even if we did not book, but in general you need to book because if someone did before you, you won't get to play. It was very good and people that never played could actively participate. I strongly recommend it!

I loved this !. It was so much fun from the beginning to the end. The staff was very friendly, the lady did a good job! It was my second experience of an escape room and I think this one was the best. Everything is very well explained before starting and the riddles themselves are logical and solvable. This one was very professional and tricky. It is supposed to be scary and it really is! They really managed it to make it feel quite real! I wanna do this in every city they offer this. Absolutely worth a visit!

Just Fabulous!. Our first experience of an escape room and it was absolutely fantastic! The staff were friendly, enthusiastic and really made us feel comfortable. The room itself was so creatively designed and had lots of surprises. We thoroughly enjoyed our experience here and it has now set a very high bar for the many more escape rooms we intend to explore. Best hour of our lives!

Excellent staff service and great puzzles!. We went to the escape room randomly as we were walking past, and staff were quick to accommodate us and were extremely friendly. Highlight of our holiday! We had a great time solving the room and were offered some tea and biscuits. Will definitely be going back!
Fun time. Very nice staf, good atmosphere at the venue and overall was excelent fun! The room was very interestingly set up and the puzzles stimulating. Would reccomend.

Amazing!! . I am visiting Amsterdam with a friend and we found this on tripadvisor. Needless to say like every other review this escape room is amazing, well thought out, clever and slightly creepy. The creepiness only adds to the excitement of this room though. Neither myself or my friend had ever experienced an escape room before and we are so glad we chose this one, although we are desperate to do more and worried that none of them will live up to the expectations of this. Another thing making this so unique is the fact it's based around solving puzzles and riddles but not the typical 'lock and key' escape room. The hosts are super friendly, inviting you to sit, drink and eat biscuits and sweets beforehand, while they introduce you and explain the story behind the room. We paid €75 between us and it was completely worth it. Anyone visiting Amsterdam trying to decide which escape rooms to do, definitely make this top of your list.They are also near completing their second escape room which we have already planned to come back for..

AMAZING!!!!!. I have never left a review on TripAdvisor before, but this time I want to let people know how GREAT this experience is. I went with a friend and we had SO MUCH FUN! I get scared very very easily, but still I would do it again. So dont let your fears stop you from going to Phobia! Honestly, it is worth every euro, and I cant wait until they open the next room!

Worth every cent!. At first we were unsure if it was worth it for €75, but on reflection we would have been fools not to!! Our first ever escape room but definitely not the last! We were unsure of what to expect but our host made us feel totally at ease before we went in. We got stuck a few times but our host was able to offer us hints to point us in the right direction. A fantastic experience, recommended to all our friends and family. Do it! Go book it now!

Amazing interactive experience!. Our first escape room, and we are hooked! This was so much fun, we beat it with 1 second to spare, which made it even more intense. The lighting, sound and flow was amazing and helped us lose ourselves in the story. Don't leave Amsterdam without stopping here.

Claustrophobia never felt so good.. The claustrophobia escape room game was an amazing experience! I have done two other games before that, and never have seen so much love for detail and high quality triggers to progress through the game. The story outline is very nice and when I am thinking back about the story development it still gives me shivers as if I just witnessed it.Although veterans could feel a lack of challenge I think it will be a visit to remember and defiantly a great station for people new to the escape room concept.

Fun and exciting way to spend time in Amsterdam. Claustrophobia was our first Escape Room we ever visited. So we had no idea what we should expect. What we then experienced was awesome. We hadso much fun solving the puzzles and riddles and working as a team to open the room again. The riddles and puzzles can be solved without any special knowledge, so also small childen will have fun)We can definitely recommend this activity for everyone staying in Amsterdam

Creative thinking for great fun. This was our 2nd escape room, after completing the hint hunt in Paris. This was great fun and a mix of panic and excitement to solve the puzzles and challenges. Works best when each team member investigates different aspects of the room and then as a team tries to figure out the next step, got stuck a couple of times, so game host gave very general hints without giving much away to help us onto nex stage and managed to complete the challenge in 55 mins. Might be a bit scary for very young children but fantastic fun for our teenagers. Recommend highly.

SO THRILLING!. This room kept sending chills up and down my spine every second! It's so beautifully built and decorated, the puzzles are challenging and fun, the hosts are amazing. Seriously, it doesn't get more awesome than this. AND we set the European Record! With no clues!! Há! Are you up for the challenge of breaking it?? ;)

Creative thinking and stays intriguing!. We had a blast the four of us, you can go the whole thing with 2 people but it's the more fun when you share all your experiences together! No really special skills required just a creative way of thinking!

Dream room. We had wonderful 60 min. Almost escaped....
A real team family building.
The riddles were challenging and we enjoyed from each child and adult advantages.
A recommended family experience.

Exhilarating and fun!!. We visited this establishment on our last day, and didn't regret it one second! We were met by two friendly people working there, and they kindly explained to us the concept since none of us had ever been in an escape room before. We got 60minutes to find our way out by solving some really intricate and creative puzzles, and everything matched the concept of the room really well! We solved it in 39 minutes, and the only bad critique we can give, is that we wished it lasted much longer!! We were 3 friends doing this together.Book in advance to make sure you fit in their schedule!

Mind Blowing Escape Room. I had previous experience of playing escape rooms and I was completely stoked to play this room. Even though I was excited, I had no expectation because every escape room is so different. I have played couple in The Netherlands and Asia.Words can't describe the different waves of adrenaline and feelings I went through when I was playing this room (along with the different levels of my mind being blown). This room was "automagical" in its purest form. Things that I didn't think could happen was happening. It was basically a small Disney Land captured in a room. I would recommend this to everyone who is interested in playing an escape room. But it might ruin your experience of other escape rooms. This room would set the bar up high. Thankfully Claustrophobia is opening their second room.

Brilliant. My partner and I visited Claustrophobia with my 11 year old daughter and had an amazing experience. For anyone not used to Escape Rooms (as we were), the idea is much like The Crystal Maze that used to be on TV. We were given a friendly welcome, drinks and biscuits, followed by a clear introduction into what would happen when we entered the escape room. Finally we had a chance to ask questions before being taken into the game room, where the host asked if we were ok before leaving the room. At that point the lights went out and the fun began. This was the first time we had been in an escape room, so although I can't compare to others, we found the puzzles to be pitched well in difficulty: they were challenging yet achievable, all three of us were well engaged, experienced everything from hope to despair to jubilation and really loved the hour. The imaginative narrative that accompanied the event really added purpose to its puzzles and an extra layer of enjoyment.Sadly, we didn't quite make it out within the hour. At times we were really challenged to think and got stuck, with the clock ticking this added a real sense of pressure. Whenever this happened though, the Games Master dropped hints into the game for us that never gave anything away, but pointed us in the right direction. When time finally ran out, the host and Games Master came into meet us and revealed that we were on the last puzzle. They took the time to explain what we would have needed to do to complete it and this was a really nice touch.Escape rooms aren't the cheapest hour and a half you'll ever have, however we literally talked about everything that had happened, for several solid hours afterwards, the experience is brilliant value, unforgettable and I'd recommend you to go.

Game host wasn't really good. Being an escape game enthusiast I've been to quite a few (20+) across the world (5+ countries), so this review is based on my experience to others.We arrived in a good time, and our host greeted us with a great smile on her face. She sat us in their waiting area, which was cosy, then the briefing begun.Being experienced players (which we told our host) we are aware of the rules of escape games. She still took about 10 minutes to explain us what we CAN'T do in the room. (I know there are special rules, but these were just basic ones) After that she spent barely 2 minutes to tell us the story of the room. I even had to ask what the goal is as she completely rushed the story telling part, and only focused on the rules.The room itself is slightly scary. Nothing bad but lights go off every now and then accompanied by scary noises, so be prepared for it.Puzzles and the game set up was nice actually. They really got us thinking and we enjoyed the surprises built in the room.A few things that really took away from the experience:There was a puzzle which didn't feel logical at all, and the solution even after we got told felt a bit random.On the timer display you can either have the time or a clue. This is a bit frustrating specially closing to the 60 minutes mark.We got stuck with the final puzzle for a good 10 minutes. We actually solved about 80% of it, and we understood how it works. The problem was that we got stuck on 2 minor maths based puzzles. Our game host was aware which ones are we stuck on, so she pointed us to look at the same thing again and again. I must say that we were a team of two and once you are stuck on a wrong idea it is really hard to leave the loop. In my opinion in this case the game host should have amended her clues to knock us out of that loop, not just point at the same thing again and again as we were clearly stuck on a wrong idea for about 10 minutes.She was unable to present a different approach with her clues which in the end came in the cost of our successful escape. (Until that point we were proceeding very well.)In the end we run out of time and she had to come in to show us the final puzzle, such a shame.After the game she took a photo of us, and rushed us out of the door as the new team was arriving. I wanted to re-enter the waiting area to grab some water and rest a bit after the game, even to have a chat with her but she used a body language to make it clear for us that it is time to leave.I would give the game itself on its own a strong 4 stars, and 2 stars for the game host for the above mentioned problems, which evens out in an overall point of 3 stars.

A beautiful experience. Fantastic! This game is very creative, intricate and beautifully made. The hosts were fantastic and incredibly friendly. Also it's extra cool that they're the founders and builders as well. This was my fourth escape room in Amsterdam and it didn't disappoint! I've also done Room of Riddles (a bit disappointing, but a good basic room), Sherlocked (simply amazing!) and Logic Locks (wonderful; very cool story). Can't wait to see what these guys will make next!

A lot of fun. Being Escape Room virgins, me and my girlfriend didn't know what to expect. Once we entered the room, we knew this would be fun! It was a really cool story and you can't help but get into detective mood. I will definitely try out more escape rooms in the future. This one in Amsterdam is highly recommended.

Great first escape room experience!. Myself and my girlfriend had never attempted an escape room before and were a little nervous about what to expect. But we were pleasantly greeted at the door and Tess looked after us. She explained everything there was to explain, answered our questions and really made us feel excited for our first experience. The room itself was fantastic (careful not to give out any spoilers!), creative, unexpected and really fun. Would recommend to friends and family.

So much fun!. We'd not heard of these real life escape games until we browsed things to do in Amsterdam. As fans of the computer versions we thought we'd give it a go. Wow. We are officially addicted! This was so much fun. Didn't really know what to expect but threw ourselves straight into the various challenging and often very random tasks. It was really well put together and full of surprises. We were a small group of 2 and managed to escape with one minute to go. Already looking for others nearer home but fear they won't match this quality! Not cheap but worth every penny.

One of the best if not THE best in Amsterdam! . Trust me on the title. I've played like 7 escape games some of them were amazing - this stands on a totally different level.If you want something that is polished, VERY IMMERSIVE and that makes sense GO for this one. After a few mins, you'll feel like you've stepped into a different world and you'll forget about the world outside - this is what draws the line between excellent immersive games and "unlock the drawer" kind of game. Finally, ZINA was extremely nice - showed her enthusiasm and I feel was on the same roller coaster as us.

Fun time for group with wide range of ages. We wend with kids and adults and everyone had a fun time. I am a bit of a newbie at escape rooms but I suspect this one is on the end of "easier" than "very hard".

Must do Escape Room!. I've done Escape Rooms in Budapest and Los Angeles. This was the very best room I've done so far! Clever puzzles. Varying tricks. Flows very well! Great story! Incredibly interactive and perfect for a team of 2-4. You must go to this Escape Room! It's a must!

So much fun!. We are escape room newbies, and for two of us it was only our second room escape.Everything about this was excellent! Great story, clever puzzles and brilliant design! Definitely the most fun we've had in Amsterdam!

Absolutely wonderful. Me and my friends are real escape game enthusiasts, and Claustrophobia greatly exceeded our expectations. It's one of a very few games that raise the bar for all the others. No padlocks (almost) and no gimmicky clichés (like blacklight).Very pretty and with a very nice theme.

The best escape room ever!. While on vacation in Amsterdam we happened upon Matilda's dream. My wife, I and some friends had previously done 3 other escape rooms and quickly became obsessed with them. When it comes to this one though it was light years ahead of the others we had done. It was so well thought out and the puzzles and clues were so original! If ever back this way we would do the new room for sure. This is a can't miss!!!

Great Puzzle Room. This is a great puzzle room. The location is easy to get to by tram and a simple 5-10 minute walk. Online reservations were super easy and they spoke great english. The hosts were very pleasant and the room was well designed. There were NO claustrophobic elements so don't let the name of the company deter you! This puzzle room was a great concept and on a difficulty level about a 7/10. Some elements were tricky but very doable. We had a group of 3 and it was a lot of fun and we talked about it for days!!!
Amazing. I've played other escape room in the netherlands and this is by far the best.Great story and quality of the puzzlesHighly recommended

A very exciting experience. This is our first escape room and it made the whole experience even more memorable. The room is great with cool and challenging puzzles, and great ambient. We highly recommend it. Our nine year daughter enjoyed it tremendously.

Gets your inner child's creativity back!. We had a great time with 4 people! Great story, wonderful challenges! You forget about the time and find back you inner child's creativity! Absolutely recommended as your first escape room challenge with friends or family!

Brilliantly clever . Absolutely loved it,cleverly done,so much to figure out & do. A few jumps here & there but it was what made it :)
Highly highly recommend!!!
Will differently visit again when new set up is up & running!!!

Amazing !. This was a great experience and a real surprise. I'm French and I went to Amsterdam to visit the town. I never heard about this kind of games but I found it on trip advisor and I decided to give a look and to talk to the people who propose this game. It seemed to be very nice and very interesting and the creator seemed very nice. So we decided to try the game and we really enjoyed it ! It'es intelligent, fun, nice, surprising and it's impossible to be bored by this game. You have to be at least 2 people to play, you must have team spirit to have more fun, I advise this game to everyone and the team who welcomed us is really nice.
Great fun!. This place was amazing, and my expectations were beat by a tenfold! The staff was friendly and the riddles were very Good. Recommended!

fun experience. Very interesting and fun experience! It had all sorts of puzzles that kept players busy and intrigued throughout the game. Would definitely recommend it to people who are into puzzles or similar kind of games.

Great Fun. First escape room my friend and I have every tried. It had a very imaginative and captivating atmosphere, filled with good puzzles but not perfect. Our host was friendly and welcoming. We were actually quite late arriving to our designated time but they were kind enough to let us continue at same price as there was no one after us. Overall: thoroughly recommended 9.5/10.

Our first experience with an"escape room". Maybe we're just not "hip" Americans but we had never heard of escape rooms before and literally stumbled upon this during our walk around Amsterdam. I have to say it was quite a unique experience, and loads of fun for an hour as we tried to follow clues and escape. The setup was quite elaborate and we were very impressed with how much work he been put into creating this. We will definitely try another escape room sometime, hopefully we can find one near where we live in California. At $25 Euros per person, it certainly wasn't a bargain, but then again, nothing really is in Amsterdam....

Absolutely Awesome!. First escape room experience and these guys have set the bar really high!The game was very interesting, and the four of us enjoyed it thoroughly. It was all logic based and required critical thinking so things never got too easy (aka boring)The lady who we met and spoke to was very warm and welcoming. The option to write on and then get clicked with chalk boards after the game also added a bit of fun!A must visit for sure!
Great fun !. Had an awesome experience in this escape room with 3 friends ! It's all about team work, having fun and waking up Matilda ! Definitely a 'must do' !

Best escape room ever!. I've played about 20 escape rooms, and this one is definitely the best one I've played. The atmosphere is brillant, the set is perfect. The puzzles are very original. Just amazing. The only thing...every other escape room you will play after this one will never be as good. :)

Worth your time!!. Went with 3 friends and had a blast. The puzzels were great and the room a little creepy at times and with clock on show you could feel the stress coming, which made it a little different from the other escape rooms i have tried.
So if you have an hour to spare in amsterdam be sure check it out!!

Wow! So much fun!!!. Did not have a clue what I had signed my wife and I up for but we had the most fun!If you've never done one, try it! Could not shut up about it afterwards, such a laugh! Rachel was very friendly and helpful. Can't wait until they get a new room up and running. Will be back for a visit!

Best One for First Timer and Wonderful for Escape Room Enthusiasts. I am a self proclaimed escape room addict and I have played many rooms all across the globe. So it is only natural that my bar was set really high when it comes to escape room expectations. This room met it and even exceeded it.Some escape rooms are better than others. Those at the bottom of my list are simply consisting of series of puzzles and locks without a story line and without atmospheric surrounding. The better ones are more creative in their theme and incorporate interactive clues and puzzles rather than just static ones. The best ones go beyond. The puzzles are cohesive with the theme, there is an advancement of story line as you're making progress in the game, and cool things happen, REALLY cool things happen. If you have never tried an escape room before, this room is perfect for you. The puzzles are challenging without being frustrating, the story is well thought off, and the atmosphere is set up to complete the entire experience. This is exactly what you should expect from a great escape room. Just be aware that not all escape rooms are this well designed.If you're familiar with the game like me, I am sure you'd be pleasantly surprised. To me, having played so often, the best joy of escape rooms is not when you finally made it out, it's about everything else that happen before that. This room definitely got that part right.

One of the Best Escape Room!. I have tried several escape room before but this one sure makes a very good memory. I come here with 2 of my friends who visited Amsterdam from Germany. This was their first escape room. And they loved it!The theme is perfect, the feeling inside the room and all those tricky trick. If you are an escape room enthusiast, this room you should not miss!The location is right in the center and easy to access by public transport. Or if you feel like walking, it is 10 minutes from central station Amsterdam.Try it!

Thrilling, well made and awesome experience!. If you like riddles to solve and games to play, Claustrophobia is exactly the adventure you are looking for. An hour of exciting riddles to solve and unexpected twists and turns makes this an unforgettable experience. The theme is very well made and thought through! Looking forward to experience there second room, hopefully opening soon.
Riddles. I always loved solving riddles but this escape room beat everything! I enjoyed to team up with my boyfriend to solve the riddles and it was a really pleasint experience for me.
Cool escape room. nice experience, it is all about logical thinking, collaboration and find out step by step how to escape!

Nice escape experience. People who host the game are friendly, made us feel comfortable. The room itself is a bit small but we still had a good time. It is on a good location in the city center. A lot of logical thinking, great design, but not the best escape experience ever.

Amazing, advance escape room!. I did this escape room in Amsterdam with my boyfriend. We had done one escape room before in Glasgow and even though we loved it, this one was far more advanced especially in terms of how the room was completely built for the game. I had also searched for an escape room where you could do it with just two people and it was perfect but it would definitely be suitable for a group as well. I would definitely recommend this for people who have never done an escape room before but also for those who have, as it challenges you in different ways. Overall, it was really fun and a great activity to do as something a bit different.

a good hour for me :D. my experience in claustrophobia was so amazing, it was a real experience of my childhood dreams and it excited me so much. I'm so proud that our team was the first Iranian winner ;)یه بازی خیلی فوق العاده بود. واقعا لذت بردم...درواقع یه بعد از ظهر خاطره انگیز رو برام تو آمستردام ساخت..واقعا به همه توصیه اش میکنم

A highlight of our trip!. This was the first escape room for both my boyfriend and I. We had no idea what to expect but felt very comfortable after the guide explained the rules and storyline. The escape room is located very conveniently, being about a 15 minute walk from Central Station. Without giving too much away, we had so much fun with the riddles and puzzles. We felt challenged but never frustrated. It was a lot of fun to think creatively for almost an hour (made it out in 54 minutes!). Definitely a wonderful experience and made us want to try more escape rooms in the future!

Amazing fun, exciting and challenging - Hen Party from Leeds. A fantastic fun and different Hen Party activity. Hen Party was split into 2 teams so it got competitive. Was a brilliant way to spend some time doing something different. Was exciting and really had to think and work together. Staff were so lovely and accommodating and gave us refreshments while we waited for the other team. Can't say enough positive things, WE LOVED IT!

One of the best memories of my trip to holland. It Was a great game to play with your friends , the adrenalin rush , all the puzzles , and the host was amazing. It's not that hard so everyone can enjoy it but its a matter of focus and teamwork. Had a great time and was talking about it with my friends all day. The host was amazing and very friendly . I highly recommend this if you are with your friends visiting amsterdam. 1 hour of adrenalin rush and fun.
great. it was really a great experience . i highlly recommend it for all the people who visit amsterdam the person who was in charge was extremly kind and nice with full of energy .
It was an perfect Hour. We was in a Team with 5 People and we really enjoyed our Time there. They did it really clever, we had lots of Fun.... It was really a gret Time there. Sven

Excellent - one of the best. Great styling all centered around a little girls bedroom.. Lots of cool puzzles (not going from lock to lock but real surprises when you solve something. Friendly game master. Would and will recommend to anyone.
Super! Very interesting experience!. Fullly satisfied! Good location! Nice instructor. We were 2 couples and make it in 57 minutes! For sure we will try again in other location.
Dynamite Double Date!. We met another couple in Amsterdam for the weekend and had an absolute blast at Claustrophobia! Totally inspired to try other escape rooms.

Go!. We'd never been to an escape room before but have played a lot of games like myst, broken sword and the room so jumped at the chance to do it in real life. It was brilliant! If you like puzzles or just want something different to do, this is the one. The story line is very immersive, it's extremely well designed and there's such satisfaction to getting the puzzles done!

Really clever. I had been to an escape the room game in London but it doesn't come close to how good this was. Really cleverly done, a few nice little surprises. Hard enough to make you think but not impossible that it wasn't enjoyable. Staff were really friendly as well. Highly recommend.

Incredible Escape Room!. Claustrophobia knows exaclty how to build a fantastic escape room experience. Leaving a lot to the imagination, you immediate dive in to a wonderfully created escape room with a lot to soak in! While not to give too much away, I am fully confident that ANYONE would enjoy this room. Great location, fun staff and a superb room -- Claustrophobia is one of a kind! I'm looking forward to the new room opening in the next few months!

Great Room!. This was the second escape room I played and I am afraid it spoiled me forever. These guys really understood what an escape room should be about. A magical experience almost as if you are a child again. It helps that the theme is related. A wonderfully executed and dream-themed children's room is where you start. The only disadvantage of this room is that they are so successful they are building a second one, so the decoration outside the room was not stellar yet. Who cares as long as the game itself is good, right? The host was very nice though and very intelligent as well.
So much fun!. Of course I am not allowed zu wrote anything about the room but what I can say: It was really absolutely so much f*** fun! Just do it and greetings to Mathilda! :-)

The best room I 've ever played. We 've played some rooms in Germany and then 2 different in Holland , but this room topt everything !!!Starting from the super welcome by the staff member , decorations in the room and the ideas in the room , everything fantastic...You enter the room and immediately captured by the story . A very big congratulations to the developers of this room , we were thrilled .

High quality room, nice puzzles, good fun!. As compared to the many other escape rooms we have visited...Room build quality: 10Cleanliness: 10Professionalism: 10Puzzles: 8.5Challenge factor: 7A very strict sequential puzzle solving room, we very much enjoyed ourselves but never did we find ourselves feeling time pressure, that takes a bit of excitement out of the game.Nevertheless, very professional and nicely well thought out game and very nice puzzles. You can see a lot of effort was put into the build quality! This is definitely the highest quality room construction we have seen to date.Not cheap but I guess you have to pay for the location... ground floor and Amsterdam central station is only 5 min away, not some damp cold cellar somewhere far from the center. Plus they have to recover the cost for the very high quality set up.They are working on the 2nd room and we are sure we will be back to try it. Still 100% completion rate.

A Very unique experience!. This escape room provides a unique experience!It makes you think outside the Box and it so much fun!!!Very well organized and quite clever!I am definitely coming back for the next quest!!!

Amazing!. This was my fourth escape room and this was by far the best! Perhaps it is not the most difficult one (around 75% will get out of the room) but it is by far the most beautiful room, well developed, full of techniques and very cool sound& light effects! We did the room with two and it was perfect :-) If you want to try an escape room.. definitely go to this one! But on the other hand.. all other escape rooms will be less nice after this one. Luckily they will be opening a new room within a few months! We can't wait!

Wow!. Third escape room and by far the best! Well thought theme and connecting puzzles. Good and sometimes scary (sound) effects. You can tell that the creators put a lot of effort, time, money and love into the room. Can't wait for their second room!
Very professional escape room. A spooky atmosphere, a variety of puzzles and a good story line. The best escape room I've been to so far. Go there!

Awesome! Will definitely come back! . Wonderful room and great hosts! Really great riddles, next to logic you need to be really creative and think abstract. We had so much fun, we were actually disappointed when we got out!! Next time we're in Amsterdam, we will definitely try the second room. By the way, this is a great test for couples ;)

Your own detective/thriller story: what a trip!. Wonderfull experience! My first escape room and now I want more!!:-) We were with two and we managed to get out just in time.
The hosts are very kind and help with tips if really needed.
I'm coming back when the second room is ready.
Must try!!!. We are big quest lovers and this quest was one of the best we've ever experinced!Very clever unordinary puzzles, great scenario!!!Very pleasant atmosphere and the most welcoming host!!!

Great fun!!!!. Absolutely enjoyed this escape game. Didn't win, but so close! Different experience from normal attractions but way tools much fun!!
Not quite city center but a taxi can get you there.

Great experience!. We loved it! I totally recommend it for people who really enjoy putting their minds to work for fun! The hosts are so kind and helpful! Congratulations! CTeam please send us the pics whenever you can, we are excited to show our friends that we made it! :)
Awesome experience. Didnt know what to expect and we thought it might be scary... it turned out to be very challenging, fun, and certainly an outstanding experience.

Well designed escape room and great hospitality!. We were welcomed by tea and cookies while waiting for our game to start.Game is very well designed with fantastic flow and pace. Cool sound and light effects and fantastic story telling! What makes the experience special is the hospitality of our game master. Def recommend this as a top escape game for friends group or with your co workers!

Just go for it!. We were a group of 4 friends relaxing in Amsterdam on our last day. I suggested we try an 'escape room' and although apprehensive everyone agreed. We were literally one step away from completing the game. Very professional setup and exciting game. So good I will definitely be trying again.

wow!! so much fun!!. what an amazing time we had! teams of 4 in a locked room, we had to solve puzzles to escape! it was GENIUS!! so well thought out and full of surprises! nothing was what it seemed!!!! amazing! they're making another one! I cant wait :)we all had an absolutely fab time!would defo recommend this, its a short walk from central station so ideal to break up the day if your visiting the city!!!staff were great so accommodating and friendly!!!

Highly recommended. Visited on 20th April with 3 friends, was a brilliant break from the normal Amsterdam activities.Host was excellent and the room itself is challenging and impressive. Would highly recommend to anyone...

Shut up and take my money!. We visited as two couples who had never done an escape room before and had no idea what to expect. I had read an article on BBC News a few weeks before we visited Amsterdam about the growing craze across Europe and convinced the others to visit one whilst in Amsterdam.The woman who hosted our experience was brilliant, couldn't have asked for a better person to explain the story and then to chat with afterwards. We actually left the building and stood outside for twenty minutes talking about how good it was....I don't think I've ever done that in my life before!Without giving too much away....The whole set up is fantastic, carefully put together with intricate detail. If there had been another room open after our session here, we would have gone straight there and done it all over again.We plan to visit more escape rooms and I have even been looking into the possibility of setting up my own escape room back home. That's how good it was! Can't rate it highly enough...Go see it for yourself!

Great family game - loved it!. We are a family of 4 - our children are 12 and 13. We had a blast and all of us really enjoyed our hour. Great story to this room with achievable - but challenging - puzzles that everyone was involved in solving. Well thought out and great decor. Like everyone looking forward to trying the second room when it arrives.

Fantastic just under one hour fun!!!. This was only our second ever Escape room. We thought it was the best so far. It is really well constructed, the room settings are great. It has nice surprises, it takes quite a lot of thinking, but it is feasible. The staff was helpful and very accommodative.I can't wait to try the soon-to-come other escape room.

Great fun, Unique experience!. This was a very original and interesting experience and a lot of fun too. You will sure to be telling people about it for a years to come. The staff were incredibly friendly and welcoming. I'm looking forward to the opening of their second escape room.
Great experience!. Having done two escape rooms before, this is in a league on its own! What a great experience! Impressed by the decor and the technics!
Best thing to with friends!. Great experience, it's amazing how this company developed this escape room. Be creative and watch the details. Hope you will escape ;-).

Must do! . We had a blast! It was the most fun thing I have done in ages! I kno that guys are building new room & I can't wait to go back & check out what have they came up with this time! Great atmosphere! Great people! Lots of fun challenges! Everything I like in 1! If they served food there I'd move in :)

Escape Room, great fun!. My team and I recently visited this room. What a great experience it was. The room was very well designed and left us with a feeling of adventure. I can 100% recommend this room to anyone looking for something new to try.
Do it. The reviews say it all. Do it. You'll enjoy it. I wanted to write less but I have to write 100 characters.
Great Experience!. Friendly hosts, captivating hosts and an exciting hour. Will recommend to anyone who wants to experience something new & different.

Fantastic Fun. Non-stop adrenaline as you rush from clue to clue, trying to find the way out! This was our first escape room so at first we were a bit confused, as you are just locked in and left to take the iniative, but we soon got into the swing of it. All the clues are right there. We made it just in the nick of time; it was so close! Highly recommended.

Fantastic experience!. We still can't stop talking about it! It may be only an hour in the room but we spent the rest of the day rehashing every puzzle, every clue and every "aha" moment. I highly recommend this to anyone for a great day's entertainment.

Matilda mania. We were three random strangers checking this out via meetup.com one afternoon, and had a blast jail-breaking our way out within 48 min. It was a super fun adrenaline rush, too bad we couldn't keep playing on and on and on. The guys who set this up are really creative, plus appreciated that they were very understanding despite some last minute changes on our end. Go check it out, you'll have fun for sure!

OH MY GOD!. I don’t wish anyone nightmares like these, but I will make sure each and every one of my friends will experience Matildas!As a somewhat experienced rookie (Done some similar activities in different countries but only played one other Escape room in Amsterdam) I was really amazed by Claustrophobia! This is definitely the most elaborated and best put together I’ve done. I love the details and thought put into every little part of it and I was highly impressed even though we barely made it through! With only 2 minutes remaining, me and my two friends did it and felt pretty f-king proud as it certainly wasn’t easy!Highly recommended, wether you’re experienced or not, this is a little different and guaranteed fun way to spend 60 minutes!
Great experience!!! . It's a nice experience if you're looking for some fun with a couple of friends!!! It's a very well crafted game that can leave you with some good memories!

A brilliant experience.. It's scary, it's exciting, it's intense and it's one of the greatest game experiences I've ever had. It wasn't my first escape room, but it was the coolest one. When you visit Amsterdam and you want to do "something different", this is the way to go. Worth every penny.By the way, the game is in English, so it's also great for tourists (main reason why I'm typing this review in English).

Wow, wow, wow, wow, wow.. This was one of the best things I have ever done!We are a family of four with two teenage boys and thought an escape game might interest us all and it certainly did that!We had 3 days and two nights in Amsterdam and, whilst we wanted to do a couple of museums, we wanted to do something else that would entertain us. For us, a couple of museums is enough on any visit.It is great fun, gets the mind ticking and the heart racing! You have to do it!

Great escape room!!. This was my first escape room and it prompted my family to try other escape room games in the Amsterdam area. It is definitely worth the hour! The game makes you think as well as tests your teamwork with your group. Great experience and I would definitely recommend a trip to this escape room!

Legen... (wait for it) dary!! . Our first escape room: the best experience ever! An hour really, really well spent. If you like to challenge yourself and have lots of fun with your friends, don't even think twice. We are already planning your next one! Amazing staff, btw!

Unique experience. I enjoyed every minute in the room, it was the really unique experience for me. Everything was awesome, story, effects, tasks...! Amazing, you should try it too! Highly recommended!

The funnest thing I've done in a looong time!. I played this game with a group of friends. We played two other escape rooms before, but still we mind-blown by the experience. It was completely like a dream - from the time the key turned behind us and till the moment we emerged back in the real world, we were completely immersed in the surreal world of Matilda's dream. Enjoyed every minute of it, highly recommended!

Best Escape Room EVER. I wish I could rate this as more than "excellent." With my husband and our two friends, we have completed over 5 escape/adventure type rooms. Each one has been unique and challenging in its own way, but Matilda's Dream is now on the TOP of our escape room list as our favorite. I want to say SO much but I am afraid that I will accidentally give something away. Let me just say that 3 days later, I am STILL hearing the music that is in the room! Absolutely incredible escape room. It was so awesomely different from everything we've done. I hope there are more rooms to come in the future because if there are, we'll be first in line!
Insanely Good. This was amazing. An hour goes really quickly in the room and, well, urm, ARHG! So hard to review without giving it away :-) Just book in. You'll not be disappointed.

Amazing. This was amazing! It was so much fun. We played as a group of three and we were instantly sucked into the amazing atmosphere, and genuinely mind blown by some of the surprises that awaited us upon completing parts of the mystery. The puzzles were great and so much fun to complete. I simply can not recommend this enough. You must try it.
Awesome!. My first escape room and the reason I'm addicted now! Smart puzzles, cools tricks and sound. Loved it.

Unique, totally engaging experience!. It was the first time for both my boyfriend and me in an escape room. So I didn’t really know what to expect but I definitely didn’t expect that I would love it so much! I haven’t been so engaged in any game since childhood. The moment you get into the room you forget about everything and dive into the magical world of a little girl’s dream. Every detail is thoroughly thought out – interior, lightning, sounds and of course riddles! Each solved riddle makes you more and more excited and you don’t even notice how 60 min pass. Overall, highly recommended to all ‘grown up kids’. Or if a child inside you has been sleeping then this game is definitely the great way to wake them up! ;)
Awesome!!. I cannot say too much about it since it will ruin all the surprises. But trust me, you will be surprised by the things you will experience once you have entered this room..! I loved it!

Fantastic!. The attention to detail, lighting and sound are all to recommend in this excellent escape room. A group of three of us was ideal. Four would probably be good too. It was a very happy experience for all of us. It's quite central, between NEMO and Waterlooplein, but wasn't that easy to find despite clear instructions and address. Highly recommended!

A great way to start my Saturday. Last weekend I got to experience my very first escape room. I had previously heard about these games, but never gotten the chance to actually compete in one. Claustrophobia is a well designed, cleverly planned game - that starts out fairly simple but gets a lot more challenging as you work your way through the clues. Time is not your side and slips away quickly, which heightens the pressure and adds to the excitement. I loved the concept behind the game, it kept me constantly immersed in the storyline. I would highly recommend this escape room as a fun activity to do with your friends or family. Even as a team building activity with your colleagues :) Another escape room will soon be launched, so keep your eye on Claustrophobia. Exciting things to come!
great fun!. a little hard to find, but once there, very interesting experience, having never done a challenge before, we really enjoyed it, the problem solving and working our way through the game!

Fun for all ages...you MUST do this!!. My sister, brother-in-law and I did this last week while I was in town visiting, and it was the most fun we had the entire trip. The concept is cool and different, and the execution is out of this world. It's like being in a video game full of riddles! It's such a fun and different activity and so well done. GO DO THIS!! It's worth every penny. You will not be disappointed!

Super Fantastische!. 3 friends and I did this last week and had great fun. The designers are clever and creative, and I am looking forward to visiting again when the new experience is unveiled. Highly recommended for anyone who likes something a little different and challenging on an otherwise normal night.

A great experience had by all. My husband, teenage son and I had the most enjoyable time. The staff were extremely welcoming and helpful. We just can't wait for their new room to open so we can go again.
Amazing!. You definitely need to do this if you visit Amsterdam. Such a unique and exciting idea. So clever and full of exciting surprises. Absolutely loved it!

Amazingly frustrating fun. We decided to do this activity last minute and they were very happy to accommodate us. The host was lovely she made us feel very welcome. It is excellent value for money. We didn't know what to expect but behind the door exceeded our expectations. I don't want to give the game away but puzzle solving and team work is key. There are lots of little secrets and mysteries inside. Can't express how much of a great time we had. The fastest hour ever! Definitely a must try in Amsterdam!!

WOW!. Very fresh idea, super technologies, everything was nice!It was amaizing part of our walk in Amsterdam. If you will have free hour in this city, you should try to solve this quest.Thank you for great game!
Non-Stop Adrenaline Rush. Awesome setup. Innovative and tactile challenges. Fun every second. Came out ready for more! Can't wait til the second room opens.
Fantastic. THE best escape room in Amsterdam! Fantastic variation in puzzles and the scenary of THE room is breath taking. Mindblowing

DIFFERENT AND EXCITING. When a friend invited me to try this game, I was completely surprised! It was like living in a video game or being in a movie. It’s a new experience and everybody must to try it. This game is a “MUST” for everybody who visits Amsterdam.

High quality escape room. I'd say it is one of the best escape rooms I've ever played. The room is quite balanced in the sense that difficult tasks are combined with easy ones and you keep up to manage it on time. The design of the room is also on a high level and I've enjoyed the spirit of the game, although I'm not a fan of this topic. I would strongly recommend it for experienced escapers, since there lots of logics which I saw for the first time, beginners will enjoy as well, but I believe that would be quite a challenge.

Unbelievable. It was a very exciting experience. I've never played a game like that before. We had so much fun solving the riddles and getting deeper and deeper into the story. I was amazed by how "real" this unreal game felt. By entering the escape room I found myself in a world build with a lot of attention to detail! I wished the guys would build another one!

First Timers. It's a great experience for a first timer. It's full of challenging, exciting and laughing moments. Though we didnt woke up Matilda the best thing is the memories we had made. Highly recommended...

A great experience. This was so much fun to do! It's a new and refreshing game. The story of the game is great and you should try this at least once in your life. It's way different than the other activities you can do in Amsterdam.

Amazing!!!!!!. Imagine to find yourself trapped in the world of Alice in wonderland and the only way out is to solve some crazy riddles one after another. We did this in a team of two and had to work together to figure our way out.We had an amazing hour!This was our first escape room and now we want to do many more!

I would go back to Amsterdam just to do this again!. This was SO much fun! It's totally worth the time and the money. If you are interested in something else from museums or other common attractions, this is definitely the place to try out. We were 2 groups of 4 people each and we really had a great time. Highly recommended!

Woww experience!!. I was expecting some cheesy game, but was totally bowled over by the experience! Claustrophobia really gets you excited and wanting to solve every riddle put in front of you. The story is great and keeps you on your toes. It's a great place to check out with your friends if you're looking for something to do while in Amsterdam or just have some free time on your hands - and totally worth the price!

A great challenge, fun and worth it!. We did this activity as a two person group and it was better than we ever could have hoped! We ended up having a free day while vacationing here and decided to give it a try. If your in Amsterdam we highly recommend taking the time to give it a shot.

Dont think, go there!. After completing an Escape room in switzerland in almost record time, our expectations where already high. But what we have experienced in the escape room in amsterdam was just amazing!!! So many details and effects (no im not spoiling ;)) The experience you will make is worth every single cent. Thanks to the whole team, we will come again as soon as your new room is ready :) ps: now 1 hour after finishing the room, the adrenalin is still rushing trough our bodies^^

A great choice. It turned out to be a great choice! The theme of the game was outstanding and was very detailed. Enjoyed every single minute! A must try if you are looking for a night out of mystery and adrenalin!

Great challenge and real fun!. To tell you the truth i was not at all enthusiastic about taking part. But my friends insisted and it turned out to be an absolutely adorable experience! A very smart and well-thought challenge that would make you switch on your social skills, creative thinking and logic! Great way to spend your free time. Strongly recommended to everyone. Wake up and give it a try!!!

Elaborate escape room adventure!. This was the second escape room we have done and in terms of atmosphere, consistency and overall fun factor this one was definitely a winner. The puzzels are varying in the degrees of difficulty which makes it great to play with experienced and less experienced players. I was amazed by how well the puzzles were thought out and the way the escape room was designed. Very well done. Great adventure to do on a rainy day in Amsterdam!

Must-play!. The game was just awesome. If you are looking for having great fun with your friends, or if you want to make a teambuilding, that's the right place to visit! Great emotions, lot of fun. Excellent!

Fun. Its a toughy but a lot of fun!
You'll be totally on yourself (with your associates) and will have to solve the riddles in order to get out of the room. The cube says hi ;-)

Clever and Challenging. This is my second experience doing an escape room in Amsterdam and this was hands down cooler than the first experience. They have a fantastic set up and allow you to do the experience with only 2 people if you are a couple by yourself visiting Amsterdam. It was definitely challenging just doing it with two people but well worth it. A must try in Amsterdam!!

Better than the rest. We have done another locked room and this by far is the best one. I can't reccomend this place enough. We did it as a couple and had a great time! I will keep a look out for their next room and shall be the first to book!

Amazing experience. If you are looking for fun things to do in Amsterdam this is the best place you can go to. Amazing atmosphere and unbelieveble experience for a reasonable price...to be honest did not even expect it to be that good....lot`s of riddles and mysteries...definitely worth spending money on!
Best Escape Room in Amsterdam. This escape room is amazing. Exciting and it will really give you a flow. I definitely recommend Claustrophobia. Try to get out in 60 minutes!

first time in an escape room.
