I have never tried real life quests before, and I really enjoyed it!!Me and my colleauges had a blast playing it.I like that it's really challenging, you have to use your brain and work as a team. We made some good memories together. Something different and interesting to do.Looking forward to put ourself to the test again when the new quest will be ready!!

Best escape-room I have ever been to. I have been to several quest rooms, but this one - is the best! We managed to escape on the last minute of the 60 minutes and it was very exciting! Go there if you come to Amsterdam.
Awesome Escape Room!. This escape room was really cool and exciting. They put a lot of effort into all the details to create an awesome vibe, and it felt really polished. Very creative puzzles!
Claustrophobia. I really enjoyed the quest! Very positive people! Interesting tasks, difficult but achievable :) Visit it if you are looking for fun!)))

Great time, great place, great people!. The place I like a lot and I highly recommend it to everyone! My friends and I had really amazing time there full of fun, joy, laugh and a lot of puzzles that lead us to escape! That wasn't very easy but we did our best ) The riddles were creative and unpredictable, and all the game was very exciting! Thanks a lot to creators because every thing, every detail is so well done! Thanks a lot to the stuff for warm greating and nice atmosphere! We are waiting your new room to challenge!

Smart hour in Amsterdam. Pros. First of all, the location is great - you don't need to spent time to get somewhere to spend one hour on a quest. Second, the level of difficulty. This is indeed the best game I've been to; all the rest are way more stupid in means of solving puzzles step by step, and except for the time constraints there is nothing to think about. Here you really have to think (not just rush to find hidden keys for the locks) and most important - work as a team. That's great!Cons. The atmosphere is not so scary and thrilling as in some other games. Perhaps its good when you as with people who are afraid of darkness, screams and blood;) But I've missed the adrenalin part for a bit.All in all. In nearest future, it'll become a must see of Amsterdam. A lot of positive emotions in just an hour of the city center.

Best escape game I've played. I've been in a couple escape games before, but this one is definitely the best I've seen so far. The puzzles are very creative and challenging in a good way. The production is so good that during the game I kept thinking "someone must be using a control panel somewhere!"Highly recommended.

The best in the Netherlands!!!. Great location, friendly stuff and short waiting list are not the main advantages(((: However, it is new quest it's really cool!!!This is my third game and I've never had such feelings in other games! Why?Just one simple reason - it was the REAL CHALLENGE for our team :)))Some tasks were quite puzzling - and without help of my friends I even could not imagine how to find some clues .So if you want to test your friends IQ (!) and take a plesure in team work and helping each other - this is what you need. And one of the biggest pluses .. here you can HAVE FUN WITHOUT FEAR..) That's not a joke. You won't find any scaring moments like bloody dentist and so on.....pffffff....X)However, quest is really dynamic and impressive.So if you don't want to find necessary keys under the table but to use your fantasy this escape room is for you.))

Nice surprise. Played quite a few games before and that was definitely one of the best. First impression you get is that it should be pretty simple, but then the puzzles and riddles keep on coming and the more you move through the game the better they get. Pretty sure all ages will love it.
Enjoyable game in the heart of Amsterdam. I really liked this game. Moreover, the space is very enjoyable and people working there were very nice. I recommend it for everyone!

Amazing experience!. Have been there with my husband and two more friends. We had so much fun although the quest itself appeared to be really challenging for us!) but we did learn how to be a good team and managed to get out of the room in last minutes!) what I want to mention especially - is a very thoroughly and creatively thought through decoration of the rooms and attention to details in every quest. Everything was well organized, we never had to wait and were really happy to get our winners bracelets)) to conclude - it was not our first quest room, but so far it is out favorite!)
Great fun!. This was a really fun experience! Lots of mysteriuos things to figure out and puzzles to solve - an hour and 3 minutes well spent....do try it yourself!

Cool and exiting escape room. We did this escape room last Saturday with a group of four. We had a blast! The theme is good and many of the puzzles are pretty origional. Furthermore, the decor is really good. This was the first escape room (out of aprox. 10) that was a little scary at times. We all liked that. Can't wait for the opening of their second room.
Great expiriance. We had a great time, best one yet.The guy was very invested in the storyline, real nice and with a great english.

Absolutely and Definitely Worth It!. Really enjoyed this Escape Room. The story has depth, the room is well thought out and it has some surprising elements. Definitely recommend to go to Logic Locks. We did it with a team of first-time escapers and they all had a blast. We want more!Chris
Do it. Stag do - wanted to try something new, highly recommend, even with max number of people. We nearly broke the record.
Amazing. We had a blast. Fun, bit frightening, and interesting. The atmosphere and the staff are great. Would definitely recommend.

Great experience!. This being our first escape room, we weren't sure what to expect, but it was a great introduction to the world of escape rooms! The story behind it was executed well (even in the waiting area and the clothing/behavior of the instructor) and the puzzles in the room were challenging and of a great variety. I would definitely recommend visiting this escape room!
Great experience!. I've done like six escape rooms (all of them in lisbon) and this is of the best! and must do in amesterdam for sure!

Great experience. The room has a great atmosphere and the puzzles are tricky. Great teambuilding experience! The building itself is under renovation and is not that suited for receiving business clients. However, it is the escape room that counts and that part was fantastic!

Brilliant escape room- probably the best I've done. The room was great fun from start to finish. The story behind the room was well thought out and added to the experience. The room itself was beautifully designed and there was a range of puzzles to solve. We were a team of 6 which worked very well, though there was so much going on I may have struggled to complete it in a very small group. I thoroughly recommend it if you're in Amsterdam!

Great puzzles, humour and chills. Being escape room owners, and having done at least 20 rooms between us, I have some confidence in saying this is a great room. The puzzles were tricky but not hard, the atmosphere was great, hinting was done in a humorous way, and the ending was interesting. There were a couple of things, once we thought it over afterwards, that could have been better, but the actual game was top.Note, this game is puzzle-driven rather than spectacle-driven, so it appeals to me as a game, rather than an experience, though there were some nice effects.Note also, there are some occult elements and part of the game is in the dark. Also it is not wheelchair accessible.

Smart & very entertaining :). We came to the room as three friends and there were a lot of cool puzzles in the room! We were all the time occupied with them. The room is a bit scary at time but try not to panic it's worth it :)

Brilliant escape room!. The creators have paid impressive attention to detail both when it comes to story and the room decorations!This escape room is challenging - we were a group of 3 adults and all really enjoyed all the tricky riddles and looking for hidden clues. Game master was spot on when it comes to deciding when and what extra clues we needed.The stay in the room is accompanied by music which matches perfectly not only the atmopsphere of the place but also the progress of the game.I also loved that the creators added some fun touches that took us by surprise and made us laugh out loud!

Very nice experience. Very well realized, this was our first time with family and we all enjoyed very much. Were able finish just in time, which made even more rewarding. I can recoomed this warmly to anyone.

Good Escape Room. there was a good story around the whole experience and I think the instructor was really funny.The riddles were good and not too easy or too difficult. I think with 7 people we were a bit crowded at times.

Awesome Experience. This is an awesome escape room: a great, spooky, atmosphere, a very enthusiastic storyteller and smart puzzles! Definitely would recommend this to anyone looking for a challenging, atmospheric experience!

Great family activity. We really enjoyed the escape the room game! Very similar to other escape the room games that we've done before. The service was great, staff spoke a fluent English. Location is a not in the center of the city, but nonetheless worth the trek!

Great Fun. I booked this for my friends and I for a 30th birthday. Thought how fun it would be being locked in a room and trying to get out.I didn't really know what to expect but I have to say we all really enjoyed it.You have 63 minutes to find the clues and unlock boxes and doors. I think anyone who plays this will enjoy it.

Fun escaperoom!!. I've visited many escaperooms, and although their puzzles where not the best I've seen the story that accompanies the room and the eye for detail in this room were awesome! Also the staff was very fun. Overall it was a nice experience!

fun escaperoom with "love to detail". It was the third Escaperoom i tried and by far the best. The story, attention to detail and "vibe" all fit together very nicely.I had a blast playing it (as did my 3 mates, who had no previous experience with escape rooms)

Very Good Escape Room. I come with experience of more than 15 Escape Games from several countries, and I must say this Escape room is one of the best I tried. The puzzles were interesting and Coby, they operator did a great job scaring us and helping out when needed,
Overall, I had a very good experience!

Very very fun!. That was the best room I've played so far - quite challenging, very immersive and interactive! Changing light, music made us feel very excited. There was a little story of the room that we could also find in the game.
We didn't finish it but we had a lot of fun!

Good fun. The escape room is in a basement of a warehouse like building. It felt a bit weird at first, as you have to walk past a couple of rooms full of clutter. But once you get down do the escape room itself everything is very nicely done and very well thought through.60 minutes of guaranteed fun, 5 stars!! thanks for a great evening!

Awesome experience!. This was our first time doing an escape room. It was such a fun and interesting experience. We enjoyed it so much that we decided to do one in Brussels as well. It was only after that when we realised how great this one is! Interesting puzzles, great atmosphere and an all around amazing time. Would recommend it to anyone looking for something away from the ordinary tourist experience
So much fun!. Such a great escape room! Loved it! And the staff were so friendly! A little out of the cbd but easy to find and get to by bus. Definitely reccommend!!!
Great experience. This was our family's first escape room experience and we all really loved it. Very well realized and well built story.

So much fun!. This was our first escape room ever and will definitely not be our last. We did it with just 2 people and thoroughly enjoyed it. Initially when we got in the room we were a bit unsure of what to do. Slowly but surely though we managed to start working things out and it ended up being Such a fun, challenging and fantastic experience. The room was so well designed and well thought out - I really felt like I was in my own adventure movie :P Finding the venue was very simple. If you follow GoogleMaps you will have no problem finding it and there are visible signs outside the location.If you are looking for something fun to do in Amsterdam, do not hesitate and go and enjoy this awesome experience. I just hope that any other escape rooms that we try in the future can live up to Logic Locks amazing experience.

A wonderful experience!. Our group consisted of myself and partner, and his 12 year old daughter. She loves puzzles and riddles so we thought this would be a good activity but we didnt realise how much fun it would be for all of us! We were greeted by a very friendly staff member who took us through an intro to clue rooms, they were invented in Japan many years ago! Then we were introduced to the mystery we had to solve. I dont want to give anything away and spoil your own experience - I strongly recommend you have a go if your in the area! At first I was concerned if we got stuck we wouldnt have a chance but they kept an eye on us (cameras in the rooms) and we had extra clues/hints at times we were going off track. We solved the clue (slightly over time!) But it was the best fun we have had in ages. We got to work really well together and all 3 of us got really into it. At the end it was lovely to get a photo (they upload to facebook), a logic lock coin as a memoir and we were even given a huge amsterdam magnet poster as we are here on our holidays. We will be visiting clue rooms again without a doubt!Thanks to all at logic locks for a great time!

Highly recommended. First time in an escape room, & certainly won’t be our last. Let’s just hope that other rooms can live up to this one! We only had 3 people in our group two adults & a 16 year old, & with a few hints a bit of added time we managed to solve all the clues & escape. Theatrical from the very beginning, Sound effects, props add to the mystery & atmosphere. This was a great experience & would highly recommend this as a family activity.We were staying in the city centre & travelled by train it was just one stop & the trains were every 10 minutes.Hope the next time we visit Amsterdam your new room is ready.

One of the best rooms we have ever played!. Interesting story, creative puzzles, very good decoration of the room. We needed few hints, they were given in an indirect way, forcing us to think on how to use them - much better than direct tips like "look here, do that". We were surprised quite a few times, also with the sound and light effects. And the most important, we have made it and managed to exit. Highly recommended!

SUPER FUN family activity!. This was our first time doing this and WOW, so much fun! A great challenge for all of us, parents and teens. Good hints helped us through it when we got a little stuck. Fun surprises, and a great story. The hostess was wonderful! One poster said it was scary for kids under 10. I think it would depend on your particular child, no scarier than a ride at Disney. Probably not fun for children under 8 unless they are into mysteries. Perfect for teens!Can't to do another one soon!

Awesome but s little scary. One of the best things I have seen in Amsterdam so really cool. I would do it again. My only thought for it is that children under the age of 0-9 bad. It was really fun especially because it will bring your friends family together
Must do ! . Amazing experience and Boris is very friendly . It took us a little bit more time but we were able to solve it You brainies should try it :)

Great fun in great surroundings. We looked up escape rooms in Amsterdam, and found this. The pricing is ok, and the lady that greeted us was really nice, professional and friendly. Will recommend to anyone going to Amster!

Logic.. Locks.. Room.. Escape... Amazing adventure in the Escape Room of LogicLocks! Heartbumping, me and my team of filthy adventurers, were running around, looking for hints, keys, codes, anything you can imagine to find a way to escape.. within time...Taahhhhiissss is a true recomendation for all the adventurers, night travellers, tycoon riding, salty sliding, pursuers of faith within destiny! For timepirates, scummy moonraiders, underwaterworld piranhacooks or those with a clear mind ready to get lost! Haha have a good time, yaas!!
Amazing!. I've been to a few escape rooms around the globe and this tops the list for sure. And the story behind it makes it even more interesting.

One of the best in Amsterdam!. We went to this escaperoom as a family trip and it was allot of fun! The riddles were difficult enough to keep us busy for one hour and there were some surprising plot twists. I have been to several escaperooms in Amsterdam and this one is amoung the best around!

The top of escape rooms. The escape room of logic locks is on a strange place, underneath a desolated school. But that makes the experience even better. The escape room is very well organized with a lot of authentic details from a century ago. Very nice atmosphere. We escaped in 48 minutes. We were with 6 people; the maximum is 7. We can recommend this one very, very much!!
Very Creative and Beautiful room. The game already started with the introduction and immediately a feeling of excitement was created. Too bad you can't do it twice!

Great experience!!!. We came there straight after our flight,were tired and almost cancelled,at the we decided to go and it was the best decision!Great room,fun and interesting riddles and a lot of team work -we completely forgot we were tired;)Highly recommended!
A new kind of detective. . It was a sick experience. Tried it for the fist time ever and happened to do it in Amsterdam. Interesting puzzles, great team experience.
Thank you!. An exciting and very well constructed experience. Highly recommended! Had a wonderful time and lot of fun and loved the story.
Really amazing experience. As a team building experience, this logic room was really amazing! We do not finish the game after one hour but the experience was very very great! Really funny! Enjoy!

Great challenge. We visited this room as a group of 5.
Half the group had done escape rooms before and half hadn't. We all loved it.
Booked through the internet and coms were great though out
Really nice and helpful people

So much fun :D. Strongly recommended! I've been wanting to do an escape room for sometime now and had my hopes up high but Logic Locks didn't disappoint one bit. What a fun experience to channel my adventurous and inquisitive spirit and build with my team. Would do this again any day!

Some creepy fun!. First escape room was a success. The whole idea behind it is mysterious and creepy but when you use your mind to work things out, it feels so rewarding. The music, lighting and art are all terrifying but it was creepy fun!

Fun, inspiring, rewarding. This was an extremely enjoyable experience that featured a fun storyline, interesting puzzles and very friendly and helpful staff! My one single complaint would be that it was too short - but time flies when youre having fun ;)

Great laugh. I went with 2 mates and we had a blast. The puzzles were clever and there were some neat surprises. 100% worth a go. Its a little off the beaten track but follow the address on google and pop them a call when you get close. It's about €10 from central by uber. And about a 30 minutes by foot.
Great experience!!!. For one of our friends his birthday we went to this escape room. The theme they have is interesting and exciting! We recommend it!!
Great escape room!!!. The goal of this attraction is to escape from a room solving puzzles and mysteries. The hostess was also very friendly, and all in all it was a pretty good escape room.

Such a fun evening!. Went there with three colleagues during a business trip and had a great fun! It's exciting and thrilling and there is a number of puzzles to solve. A special thanks to our host who made sure we didn't relax before the job was done! ;)

Great fun room!. A wonderful & fun themed room. A nice mix of creative, logical and practical puzzles. Challenging enough to be enjoyable and yet not frustratingly hard. Lots to do and lots of objects to interact with. Highly recommended and deserving of its ranking near the top of Amsterdam's escape rooms

So much fun!. We've played in a team of 5 and loved it! Many of us are experienced escapers and totally recommend it. It's worth the trip. And as a cherry on top the host was extremely friendly and made our experience perfect!

This Escape Game is much fun!. We were in Amsterdam to visit the UpTheGame Escape Game Conference. Of course we had to play some games during this visit.Logic Locks was the first out of three we played.Arriving at the place we had to go to a process we later called "the dutch way of entering an escape game" ;-)That means you have to call someone to open the door.Our Game Master Cody opened and we were in a good mood instantly as we felt very welcome.After a short chat about the conference and other we were ready to play.To make a long story short....it was so much fun to play Logic Locks.The game has not the best set design we saw but it lives from its cleverly adjusted puzzles.....and of course Cody who did a great job.We made it out in time and again Cody took some time to have a nice chat.This Escape Game is definitely a place to go!Thank you for the great experience!
Great escape room!. It was really really great room, with great story and details. If you are in Amsterdam you must to try it!

A lot of fun. One of the best escape room I've done so far! Very scenographic ! We played in 4 and we did it in only 45 min!! I would not advise for more than four unless is your first escape room ... In the end was definitely worth it !!

Super Escape!. This is really a very, very good escape room! The story is well told, the plot thickens, and when you thought you had it, here is another surprise! We had a very good evening, we were able to get out 10 minutes before we would have been locked in forever.....;-). Please do visit Logic Locks when you are into some adventure and fun!!
Very good and challenging fun!. Superb room full of surprises, twists and puzzles. Very challenging, and with a splendid ending! Total value for money.

Great fun. The location is not that obvious to find, look for the sign by the door :)Once inside the building, you will walk through a building full of creativity, before you arrive at the entrance to Logic Logics. After entering you become part of an interesting story, filled with riddles and tricks. The riddles are fun and of a good level. You will be able to solve them, but not before crunching your brain a bit.We were with a group of 5 and had great fun. You can have drinks afterwards.

Great fun!. We went as a family of 4 with 2 kids aged 7 and 14. The kids enjoyed it just as much as the adults! The clues and puzzles were really good , it was all very well thought out and great fun! Definitely recommend to anyone.
Fun, Challenging, Entertaining!. Great story, awesome items, fun staff, overall great experience. Highly recommended!! My girlfriend and I did it as a couple only and still had a lot of fun.

Cool place! . I went there with four friends earlier today, and we had quite a lot of fun. The puzzles were diverse and interesting, the atmosphere was quite immersive, and the staff were friendly and engaging. Thanks for the fun evening! -Team Awesome

Best. Very rewarding and challenging experience. The story used for this escape room is thought through thoroughly.
We were with a group of 6 and solved the puzzles in a relative short time. Also the host was really nice and she gave clear instructions.

A great atmosphere to dive in with cool puzzles. The place is worth your time. It's really well located near the metro and has a cool atmosphere. The room is awesomely decorated and has quite a lot of puzzles to solve. The whole atmosphere gets you in the "adventure" mood. Also, the people working there are quite friendly. I would really recommend visiting it if you have the chance.

Brilliant fun - great group activity. We visited logic locks (2 mid-20s couples) last week and thought it was brilliant.We had great fun, everyone got really into it and our host Sorrel was great. Good clean fun!

Best ever . Best experience in amsterdam
Interesting room
Very welcoming staff
Very exciting and really enjoyed it
If they have other rooms i will not hesitate to visit again

Excellent first time experience. Me and my partner decided to give this a go and we throughly enjoyed it. It had a good story line and it was challenging. We managed to escape with 1.1seconds to go so we're over the moon to get out! Very friendly yet professional service. Recommend to couples or small groups.

Perfect activity for teen birthday. This was the first escape room we had ever tried and we all agreed that it was great fun. Although a bit out of the way, and the building is currently under renovation, the trip was well worth the visit. The rooms were ingeniously designed and decorated, and quite challenging to master. My son, 14, and his friends felt truly challenged, but were fully able to complete the mystery. The organisers were wonderful in helping us progress through the room when we needed a bit of a help, while not making us feel like we were completely out of our element! Thanks for your kindnesses! And the medallions were a fabulous keepsake. We will certainly recommend you to others and return again with friends!
Unforgettable team building activty. Such a fun way to get to know your team in a different way. We also really enjoyed how dedicated the staff is!

Worth the trip. This awesome logic game is a little off the beaten track and the building is undergoing renovation but that doesn't matter when you are locked in a room and given just 63 minutes to escape. Endless red herrings, scratching heads and confused looks later we still managed to escape (mind you we have done three before!)I highly recommend the effort and think it is s very good escape game.

Good fun. It was a little hard to find. It needs a sign outside. However once we were in we really enjoyed it. It was suitably scary and the clues were clever but not impossible, we managed to get out in the alloted time. Great fun for all ages

Great team building activity. We went to logic locks for a company team building event and it was brilliant! There were 6 of us and all of us had something to do, it was challenging and so much fun. The story is great and there is a lot of humour in the delivery of the clues. The host was also really friendly and fun. It was super experience and we were like excited children for the rest of the evening! Thanks!

Trip to Amsterdam. We found logic locks on trip Advisor rated being number one. so we thought we would give it ago as we did one in Budapest I a stag do. We really enjoyed it I would recommend it to anyone wanted to try something different and challenging

Amazing experience . My girlfriend and I found logic locks through trip advisor, it does not disappoint. I have already done a couple of escape rooms before and this was my girlfriend's first, Sarah welcomed us and was our instructor for the room, she was really sweet and helpful through the entire experience and really got us invested in the story, which is a first for me. We did "Elisabeth's heart", the room itself is very impressive technically and visually, they do some brilliant stuff I've never seen before that help set the atmosphere. I would say the difficulty is between medium to hard, but nothing felt like it was impossible to solve. To sum it up, amazing experience, highly recommended.

Remote location but worth a trip. This attraction is outside the centre of the city - about a 5-10 minute train ride to Slotydjik - but is worth it. Easier to get a booking than Sherlocked due to the location. Once there you are told the story of Elizabeth van Leeuwenhart - an explorer from the 1920s and her mysterious disappearance. Where is she?Finding out is great fun - we were in a group of 6 and wouldn't suggest any more as you'll be left a bit squashed. Definitely recommend this to anyone wanting to challenge their mind.

Great fun!. First time I have ever done an escape room and was glad to find it was a lot of fun. Our guide was great and the puzzles interesting and unique. Would definitely recommend and the fantastic experience has made me want to do more escape rooms.
Tons of Fun. We came to Logic Locks with high hopes and we were not disappointed. The #1 rating on tripadvisor is well deserved.

Brilliant Escape Room Activity. This was a highlight of our trip. Delighted to have escaped in 53 mins with a team of 5. We were equally puzzled, scared, amused and entertained during our confinement. Great to work as a team using a range of different strengths. Variety of puzzles and clues to everyone had a chance to contribute. Super host who set the scene very well, and looked after us very well.Easy walk from metro station. Definitely worth a visit for anyone who likes puzzles and solving problems.

Rich in story, presentation and design.. The Logic Locks basement is awesome. The builders bring a rich story, hand made puzzles (almost art) and a discovery you'd wish you could look at way longer, than the time you have.
Cool team outing . If you are looking for a fun and alternative way of spending an hour with your team, I can highly recommend Logic Locks. All in English. No drinks available though.

Really hard to find, but worth it! . Logic locks was brilliant, really engaging. Managed to complete with over a 90 seconds to go. It goes up to six people, but I would recommend 4 is the perfect number. Would love to go back if the story changes 😀😀 10/10 would do again.

One of my favourite escape games. This escape game combines everything a great escape game needs: An interesting story, accurate interior design, challenging puzzles of different kinds and a gorgeous over-all ambience. This is my personal favourite so far and I would recommend it everyone of you!
Oh ... and very friendly staff! Would love to come back once!
Awesome and challenging!. So clever and so exciting to experience. I was thrilled getting out after an hour with my 2 friends. Go do this one! And good luck!!
AMAZING !. This was an amazing experience! I can't wait for them to expand! Captivating narrative from the host! Even my skeptical GF loved it!

Best one in Amsterdam. We were on a short trip to Amsterdam and played a few Escape Games out of which this one was definitely the best.Starting with the girl that greeted us and introduced us to the story, who was very funny and really made the whole introduction interesting, and following with the room which was very well built. All the puzzles made sense, they had an average level of difficulty, things were pretty linear and all the members of my team had something to do in the room.There was also a fair share of technology and the way the story unfolds is quite entertaining.Finally, one of the things we liked best were the giveaways at the end which were really well crafted and made for a very nice souvenir. Highly recommended.

Favorite Escape Room. This escape room was fantastic. The host was great, the puzzles were great, and the story was great We finished the room after taking an extra 2 minutes. I highly recommend this to anyone is looking for a creative and fun time while visiting Amsterdam.

First escape game and we all loved it! Definitely recommend!. Since this was our first escape room experience, we didn't really know what to expect. We were all surprised in a very good way by how entertaining this escape room was. The story line was very creative and fitted the room and puzzles perfectly. The room in itself was already impressive, it created the perfect setting for the game, they payed attention to all kinds of details, which made me feel as if we really were part of the story line. The riddles were often quite challenging, so the reward was even greater when we solved them. It was really nice to see how the game relies on team work. We were a group of 4 people (2 couples) and this escape room really beat all of our expectations! Anyways, thanks for all the fun! It was the best way to spend my birthday! :D
Best escape game. Best escape game we played it in Europe. The whole family was interested and enjoyed the time. The host "Sarah" was very kind and cute.

Smart, innovative clues and secrets that make you feel like a genius!. First of all this place is a little bit out of the way if your on foot in Amsterdam but one bikes its only a 15 minute cycle. Its also quite hard to see if you go in the evening and doesn't exactly stick out but if to get there a little ahead of time it wont take you long to find it.The introduction to the room was really good with a little video giving you the details of the story and mysteries you have to try and uncover. The room itself wad well decorated with some quality pieces and didn't feel cheaply done at all.The clues are well thought of and linked well to each other, it takes some thinking but if very doable if you work together and fully explore the room.Well worth a visit if your in the area and its worth the bike ride if your in Amsterdam, great for couples and groups of all ages!

Great entertainment . Thanks guys. We really loved it. For an escape room you you really went out of your way to create a great story line.Getting at your location is already an exercise for some as well, but totally worth it. Easiest way: take tram 12 or 14.
Excellent. We went to logic locks as a group of seven after finding it on tripadvisor. We all really enjoyed it and would recommend to anyone!

CRACKED IT!!!!. This is a really good puzzle room, and I've done a few. The theme is very cool, the puzzles a good mix of head scratchers and gimmes. We did it with 3 adults: you get 63 minutes and 17 seconds to solve it, we got out the door with less than 2 minutes to spare. It's a bit out of the center, but just a 10 minute cab ride from Central station or a 10 minute walk from Sloterdijk station. Give it a go, it's fun!

Brilliant fun - would highly recommend!!. I found this on trip advisor and thought it would be fun for myself and my boyfriend while we were in Amsterdam for a couple of days. It was the first time either of us had done an escape room and he was initially sceptical and thought it wouldn't be any fun...he was wrong!! We both loved every second of it. The whole thing was so well throught out and the story was great. I would recommend taking a taxi or using public transport as we walked and it took about an hour from central Amsterdam as it is outside the city. I would recommend this to anyone who has a bit of time and wants to do something a little different from the normal sightseeing. I think it is perfect for couples, family's and groups of friends. We will definitely be visiting escape rooms again :)

First escape room I have done. Excellent. . This is the first escape room I have done. I thought the story was excellent. The clues and puzzles were pretty testing. There were 2 of us and we managed to escape the room!

Excellent trip out - highly recommend!. We found Logic Locks on trip advisor as one of the top attractions and we weren’t disappointed. It is quite a way out of the centre of Amsterdam, we opted for a taxi which took about 20 mins and cost 25€. I wouldn’t recommend walking there! There were 4 of us in our group, none of us really knew what was involved! We were greeted by a lovely staff member who told us what to expect etc… then we were taken into the room! Its not scary at all, it reminded us of the Crystal Maze! You’re given 63 mins to get out of the room, after finding clues along the way. I won’t go into detail but it was a really fun day out, we all loved it and wish it was an attraction we could go back to. We’d all highly recommend Logic Locks, it’s a fun and different day out and good if its raining as it’s all under cover.

First time 100% recommend.. Me and 3 of my friends tried it for somethings different to do! Really enjoyed it didn't know what to expect was not disappointed! Distance the only small problem take a taxi.
Exciting Game. If you visit Amsterdam you have to try this amazing game, you will be a real detective each object mean something and consider about it.Don't miss it

Great, great, great!. From the first Email until the last "goodbye" - a really, really good storyline and well with love decorated and thought trough. Good puzzles, astonishing ideas and we just really loved it. All together we loved this room - from all visited rooms (three in Amsterdam, one in Germany) till now our favorite as good puzzles that all are put well into the storyline and just made with love!!

Exciting Place!!. it's really a good activity to do in Amsterdam, we were prepared with Turkish coffee but we couldn't escape, Thier puzzles are well-thought-out and amazingly designed, thanks a lot Linda, you were a nice host :)

Be ready for surprises! . This is a really well designed escape room! We were a group of three, which was a perfect challenge. Lots of surprises and a great experience. The host was really friendly. Having done a couple of escape rooms before but this one was the best so far! The only downside is the location, I would recommend taking a taxi, but don't lets that stop you from going: the room itself will be worth it!

Best Escape Room yet. Me and my girlfriend played last week and it was brilliant. We both work at an escape room and have played quite a few together, we both agreed this one was the best we've played. The puzzles were very well designed from start to finish, they create an atmosphere inside whilst you play which really adds to the experience and it's one of the few escape rooms that sticks to the story throughout the game.  We had a chat with the staff after the game and their passion is clear to see and is reflected in the game they've created. I really recommend Logic Locks, hopefully we'll be back to play another room of their's next year!

You will regret missing this game. Really is was one of the most enjoyable moments in Amsterdam .. What a great , kind , funny host i wish all luck and success to her. Amazing game makes feel great about yourself:D. No much i can say i will ruined up the game. Wish you all luck.

what a great experience. I have played many many escape games but never in real life. I was there with my family and it was just amazing. totally recomend it for fun or team building. I think im gettig already addicted. thanks again

A very exiting escape experience. It was my first escape experience and couldn't have been better really. We had a wonderful time and it was a perfect challenge. Nice introduction to the 'story' well-timed guidance; just can't wait until they open their next room somewhere in 2016. Want to have a fun outing? This comes highly recommended.
how to test your working team. Great experience! game well-structured with different difficulty level. Nice post experience analysis with the team chaired by competent host. I really enjoy!! thanks!

Great experience!. Funny, clever, inspiring. Very nice people, great experience! Aaa aasas aasa a a a a a a a a a a a aasa a a a aa a a a a aa a a a a a aa a a a a a a s a s sss s s s s s s a a a a a a aa a

Great Escape room! . We loved this escape room! Amazing atmosphere, great puzzles, impressive use of tech. Sarah is a great host and storyteller. Be sure to go here when you're into escape rooms. But remember, nobody can hear you scream...

Our first escape room!. Logic locks is a little out of the city but so easy to get to that that shouldn't put you off. We had such a great time with the guy running it both before and after the room itself. The room is creepy and just difficult enough that we needed some hints even though I think we were quite good at it! Altogether I would go again once they have another room and would definitely recommend!

Well designed escape game!!. The Logic Locks team has obviously put a lot of creativity into the story line of this escape game to provide the best playing experience. Special thanks to Sarah, you did a really good job as a host and story teller!The game allows a maximum of 7 people per run but I don't recommend to play with more than 5 people. We were only 4 and that was perfect.

Great experience. The area puts you in the mood the moment you arrive and it becomes clear that a lot of effort was put into this escape game as soon as you start to listen to the backstory.We went there the 4 of us, my husband, my brother and his girlfrind. All of us could contribute to the puzzles, which was great. All of the puzzles are solveable without requiring luck or force, but that still does not make them easy (also note the hints you are given at the beginning!).This is more of a classic escape games, highly recommended to any escape game fans!

Fantastic Fun!. Logic Locks exceeded my expectations and was the perfect way to start off our long weekend away in Amsterdam. Booked this for myself and 4 friends, 5 in total which I believe to be the perfect number. Too many people and it becomes a shouting contest, but a smaller team meant more time for ourselves to help each other and work it out together. The host was amazing, he was very accommodating and kept our spirits high throughout. By far one of the best things we have done in Amsterdam, YOU HAVE TO GO!
Team building . Very nice and inspiring afternoon, mind breaking "lock picking". And a lovely evaluation with a serious touch.

One of the better ones. This is one of the better escape rooms we've been to - among the best in Amsterdam. They put a lot of effort into the mood and decoration, rather than gimmicks. The puzzles were nice, old-school, often physical. Definitely not easy, but nothing felt impossible or dependent on nothing but luck.We had a really great time. Thanks!

New holiday requirment. A bit out of the regular tourist area, but well worth navigating the metro. Friendly welcoming people, really well constructed room, full of surprises. The hour flew by, and we would happily have done another room straight after. Value for money and worked really well with a group of 4 people.
One of the best. This was so much fun! Exciting, challenging, and scary. Get ready people, this is the real deal! Will definitely recommend to everyone.

Great scenario!. We were 3 men and for two of us it was first experience. The game was a little bit more difficult than I expected, but when we solved some puzzles, we were more than happy!Very good place!
Jeeeej. What can I say … had an AWESOME time!! Its on my top 3 of Amsterdam escape rooms now. Ill be there for the next Alice in Wonderland room :D

Awesome adventure!. A little bit away from the city centre, but so worth the travel. The entrance gets you in the mood right away. After some explanation and the back story, the adventure starts as you enter the room. It has a great atmosphere with the decorations, the music and the story that unfolds itself through the riddles. Those were so much fun, not too easy and well thought out and hold some really unexpected turns as well. A little under an hour later we were completely psyched when the door opened. Hands down the best escape room I have ever done, highly recommended for all fans of adventure and escape rooms.

Super fun and exciting!. Our first room escape! We didn't really know what to expect, but our hostess Sarah gave us a warm welcome and gave a good introduction on how the game works and the backstory (which was very good/cool/creepy/mysterious btw).After that we went in to the room and the game started. And boy was that fun! All the details, the creepy things, the puzzles etc were very well thought out. Whenever we got stuck Sarah slipped us a clue that helped us get further with the story. We did manage to complete the story and get out of the room, but only with good help and some extra time. The difficulty level was very good - not at all too easy, and still fun when things were hard. You have to try logic locks when visiting Amsterdam! And did I mention how great Sarah was?

Something to remember. When you first see the location you don't expect a lot, but when you get in you are amazed. It is one of those rooms which makes you fully believe the story behind it. It does not matter if you experienced player or not cause it will surprise both types. Some of the riddles a very mind-blowing when you solve them. And you don't know what to expect. And what is more while playing you not only want to solve puzzles but also to find out how the story ends. P.S. you get some bonus as well which will make sure that you remember the place)

Fantastic Escape Room!. Logic Locks was fantastic. The set up and back story was really well thought out and the attention to detail in the room made the experience one to remember. The puzzles and challenges are varied and very satisfying when you find the answer. It is easy to get to via public transport or I would recommend hiring a bike to get there if you are visiting Amsterdam.

The right mix of challenging and frustrating. As a team building exercise, Logic Locks have it nailed. A series of frustratingly obvious yet cryptic clues kept us entertained. Four of us took part and went in having never experienced an escape room before...it certainly won't be the last time I visit one.After a few helpful clues we managed to escape and thankfully the team are all still talking to each other!!Slightly out in the sticks, you'd be forgiven for driving straight past this place. Seek it out, you won't be disappointed.
Excellent. Excellent escape room. It was very interesting for us. We did it with some clues. Very nice location!
Great Escape Room!. Went here with 4 friends and it was really, really great! Nice flow in the game, not too easy, not too difficult. Just perfect. And with a nice hadden surprise ;-). Loved it!

Fun, exiting and challenging too! . Existing reviews spoke highly about problem at hand, and we were not to be disappointed. The setting, plot and storyline all contributed to an exiting hour, finding clues and solving puzzles. We were told to be playful, curious and inquisitive, and together with a little monkey business we made it just before the hour was up! The whole family were all engaged by the mystery and we thoroughly enjoyed ourselves.

amazing experience!. We went along with a group of work colleagues for a team building activity. It was great fun especially as both teams managed to solve the puzzle - nothing like a bit of competition to spur you on! I'm not especially good at puzzle solving myself but it was surprised at how, once you get into it, you start to think around the problem. There's a surprise around every corner!

Great experience!!. We went with a group of 7 as a family activity. It was our first experience with an escape room and I think none of us expected it to be so awesome! Great story, great riddles and challenging as well. i highly recommend this place!

I hate puzzles and games but I wish I could do this again!. Super exciting and imaginative---loved it! My first escape room, and my first escape! I thought the riddles were really fun and different- I went with 4 of my friends and in the car on the way home we couldn't stop talking about how awesome it was!
Amazing choice. The game was excelent.. really well prepare and exciting. I went with other two people and we are sure it was one of the best choices of fun in Amsterdam!!

Great Team event. Together with my colleagues (total a group of 7 project managers) we were placed in this room with 1 mission only; Solve the riddles and ESCAPE!!!We had so much fun! Afterwards at the dinner table we have been speaking and laughing about it for a very long time. Everyone was in a state of Trance!I can't wait to do another one, although I'm doubting if it will ever be as good as this one was! Compliments to the creators!

Mesmerizing escape room!!. This was an incredible escape room experience. Didn't have this much fun in a long time! The setting is beautiful and the riddles exciting. Set up by independent, hardworking and creative people. Must go!

Super Exciting!!. Really well done! We really enjoyed it and cant wait to come back for the second room!
The story line was great, and the guys did a really good job in presenting it to us
Challenging & fun!. The building didn't look really promising, but the escape room was great! Nice for an outing with family or friends.

Am I paying to be kidnapped?. Certainly not! You're paying to be locked in an eerie room with your wits, observation and lateral thinking being the key to escape.Initial concerns about the difficulty of the puzzles were unfounded. There sheer number and variety of clues that need to be solved can fill the hour of room time, and hints could be delivered should your group be stuck.Only a short walk from the tram station, and in a rather unremarkable building. Best experienced sober.

An experience that will thrill all your senses!. Definitely the best room I every visited. Everything is great about this room. A lot of thought has gone into the decoration and atmosphere. The puzzles are varied and interesting. The staff is super nice, set the scene very well, and make sure that the pace of the game is maintained. There are a couple of real surprises, it is a thrilling experience (but no worries, it never becomes too scary).

Challenging, spooky and absolutely awesome!. This was my first visit to an escape room and i absolutely loved it. The story line is original and the decorations are very well made, which made it quite realistic (and spooky) at times. The riddles are creative and involve cool mechanics. We were there with a group of 4 and all of us really enjoyed it. Location is a bit outside the city centre, but it is definitely worth a visit!

SO COOL!. Definetely one of the best things you can do in Amsterdam! (Especially if it's raining!) Super cool and authentic place. REAL LIFE GAMING!! It is so awesome. We stayed for a while in the garden, and the whole place is full of really friendly people!
Very challenging!. The room is very interesting and challenging! It has a very diverse combination of riddles and puzzles, which also ranges in terms of difficulty! Extremely recommended!

Tantalizingly one of the most mind twisting, paradigm shifting shiz right here. So ur like in this room and it is all tidy. I mean really if that is not strange already I DUNO WHAT IS!!11!1!111 I mean it took us a few minutes like to even start looking for the way out, your locked in a room, reminds me of the third grade BUT unlike that experience I am with my close friends and not my uncle. BUT ANYWAY working together to escape this dungeon fortress of a house was a great group activity. I MEAN I LIKE SUDUKO but this is like SUDUKO +4 man i'ma tellin ya.DO IT!!

My brain still hurts, cholesterol higher then normal. At the beginning I got very frustrated my team members whose above average IQ test scores were completely overshadowed by high blood alcoholic levels. Then I suffered from extreme bouts of self-doubt - was it possible that I am not as gifted after all?Both an emotional rollercoaster and a mind twister, I bloody enjoyed every second of it. Original, authentic, worth every second!

Very exciting and cool room. We visited with 4 students and 2 lecturers for research purposes. Our game master was very nice and really brought us into the atmosphere. When you enter the room it is filled with a lot of objects (chairs, paintings, boxes etc). With your team you discover a lot of clues and step by step you are able to solve the puzzles. There are some very cool surprises. We were proud to solve the room in 45 minutes, which was very fast according to the nice and welcoming staff. Worth a visit and easy to reach by tram.

Great fun. This was my first visit to an escape game and didn't expect it to be this good. The puzzles were nice with some cool mechanical ones although a bit much 'find the code for this lock' maybe. The atmosphere and setting was really nice, a great looking room. Can definately recommend!

Great Escape Room. This was a really fun escape room with a very cool ending, Gets a bit freaky at the end and you really feel the time crunch. The guy running this place was super cool, offered us a beer before we started, and gave us extra time to try and escape at the end. The room was really well laid out and the puzzles were really inventive, though not always intuitive, or maybe that beer made me a little dumb. I would definitely have given a 5 star review if not for the location. It's way out of the way, we took a cab there and back which got a bit expensive, though I'm sure you could bike it. Anyway, this place is totally worth checking out, just plan you route there and back in advance.

Had a Blast! First time!. We went on a visit to Amsterdam and had a great time, the guy running the place was awesome as well! We didn't have anything to compare to but the puzzles seemed witty and fun.
Amazing experience. I did the room with my Family (5 people in total) and it was a blast :) - they are still talking about it 4 weeks after we we went there.

Great escape room. If you are looking for a really good escape room, this is one of the best in Amsterdam. The location isn't ideal for travellers, but if you are willing to go to leave the centre for a short period, go here. The puzzles are great and creative. They have decoys, they have fantastic puzzles. Love it.

Excellent. Challenging with different games, nice surprises, a good story and a good atmosphere, definitely the best choice in Amsterdam (maybe even the Netherlands). Do be locked in, in this escape room!!

Great experience!. What a great experience was this escape room! We've visited Logic Locks with as a teambuilding activity and Logic Locks organized it very well! It was quite difficult to make it to a good result, but very challenging! One team made it at the set time, the other not, but Logic Locks kept it going to finish it of!Thanks a lot Logic Locks!!

Excellent!. Awesome escape room! Nice, creative puzzles! DO recommend!The sound and light effects bring this experience to the top level.Moreover, an introduction to its theme and the story by Hanna was pretty artistic and fun. This is 100% 'must go'!

One of the most riveting and enjoyable experience of my life. I'd never heard of anything like this. it was the most exhilarating, exciting and rewarding hour I've spent in a long time and I will be looking for more wherever I go...although they'd have to be super amazing to compare!

Intriguing!. We spent a Sunday morning in the escape room of Logic Locks. I am not known to be a morning person but after finding where the location was (almost thought this was part of the riddle) we had an absolutely great time in the room. The atmosphere was catching, anyone remotely liking Victorian settings will love it. The room has been designed with unbelievable attention to the tiniest detail. It is an intriguing way to dive into something really different, and all of us (four grown-ups and a teenager) recommend the location wholeheartedly!

Memorable puzzle solving experience. Went to logic locks our last night in Amsterdam. We had amazing time. We have been in a escape room once before, and this was by far a better one.The story was good and the puzzles innovative. Also our host was very friendly and gave us few critical hints when we needed it. Recommend to all!

Great and unique set up. The location is not the best, it is a bit far from the centre and you are guided through an open office which felt a bit weird but it is worth getting over this shortcomings.They use a video to tell the story. The video itself felt a bit amateur (I must say though that I have some video shooting/editing background myself) but the idea was great so it still sets the mood greatly.The room itself goes hand in hand with the story, and offers some great surprises and challenging puzzles. They connect to each other and overall there is a good flow for them. The final puzzle and the door opening mechanism was actually one of the best I have ever seen in my escape fan (20+ played rooms to date) career.Only one downside for me: There is no clock in the room which was a bit odd, and in my opinion wasn't a good decision from the designers. At the end of the game we didn't know if we are still in time or we already ran out (they take away your phones as well) which completely ruined the final catharsis for me. (Especially once we learned after the game that we finished with about 10 seconds to spare)There is a nice touch at the end of the game if you escape in time, and the host was very kind to take photos of us and to have a chat, we didn't feel rushed to leave.Overall great room, great customer care, well deserved 1st place.

Great way to spend the evening. Been here today, had a lot of fun puzzling. The whole experience had a great story builded around it. Hannah was a great host and gave a few small hints to help us forward!

Exciting, different way to spend some time. This was the first escape room I and a couple of friends had tried, and we thoroughly enjoyed our experience. The puzzle room is located in the lower floor of an office come youth centre complex, and is a must try, especially if you enjoy puzzle video games such as 'The Room' or 'Carmen Sandiego'.Our host was very friendly and talkative, and drinks were available upstairs.
Brilliant . Never tried anything like it, was really impressive. While it looks unassuming from the outside, the inside was an amazing experience and one that I'd thoroughly recommend

A must try. Logic locks is a really thrilling escape game. I went there for the first time with four friends (Were all students). Since we haven´t tried escape games before its rather hard to compare to others, but this game definitely kept us tense and excited in the 50 minutes our game lasted. The history was really cool and i think we all freaked out several times during our session. Good service. Our Mongolian game maker was a really nice and funny guy greeting us with a great smile. A must try.

Super fun group getaway from the city center.. Not much more to say that other reviews don't already cover. A wonderful host, moderately challenging escape room, a bit out of the city center, but a perfect experience for groups and families of 3-6 persons. If you haven't done an escape room before or are looking for something different than the typical Amsterdam experiences, this is one to try.

The best thing in Amsterdam. By far the best experience in Amsterdam and made my birthday extra special. The whole experience from start to finish was made fun and enjoyable by the friendly and welcoming staff. I would love to do it again. The preparation that went into this thing is unimaginable and I can't wait to try out more puzzle rooms like this one. :)

Amazing time! Huge recommendation!. Very well done and a blast with colleagues or friends. I was skeptical at first and once you get into the room you feel they did this with intention and a lot of effort went into making it smooth and challenging. We had a blast and would do it again if they change the room around :)

A huge amount of fun. A great experience, was very easy to get to the fun and excitement of solving the puzzles. Theirs really is a great sense to achievement when you solve a puzzles and reveal the next nugget of information. Everyone in the group had a great time would highly recommend anyone looking for a different experience one night. P.s dont be fooled by the outward appearance of the building the room itself is very well dressed.

One of the best puzzle rooms ever!. This is the best puzzle room! The location is a little difficult to find and I recommend using a good map or taxi. We took the tram and the tram stop is after the street you need and this can get you a little turned around. The building is an old school (from like the 50's) which is creepy already and its definitely a mysterious puzzle room. The staff did a great job with the intro and the concept is great! We had a group of 3 and it was a lot of fun and quite challenging about a 8/10. Very impressed by this place.

Superb.. A real brain teaser, with huge and rewarding adrenaline rushes towards the end. We loved the tension, and the will to escape the room. Fantastic setup and just such an amazing experience. I think we'll all have caught the room-escape bug now! 5 well-deserved stars from me.
Excellent . Logic locks was definitely my favourite thing we did in Amsterdam, it was really fun and very well run, the staff seem to be passionate about it

Excellent. We all agreed this was the best thing we did in Amsterdam! Initial reactions were dubious, as it feels very unfinished and unofficial, yet once you're in and the story starts (which I have to say was very prompt, despite a slight problem with actually getting into the building!) the adventure really begins. You're taken down to a room and introduced to the story (which may seem corny at first but its all part of the fun), then taken into the room to escape. Without revealing too much, its very surprising! All the clues lead on from one another, it feels very well constructed and one can tell a lot of work has been put in to make it so.Afterwards (having escaped with only 3 minutes to spare!), our picture was taken, which any other company would charge €10 for, but we were delighted to find instead the picture would be up on the Facebook page. We were also given a small present at the end, quite unexpected!Overall a great experience, well worth doing, even if you only planned on coming to Amsterdam for the drugs and prostitutes
The best escape room so far!. Very well done room, lots of good locks and a nice story beihnd it. The location is not central, but the game was cool. Definitely recommend to go!

A highlight of our holiday. Everyone in our group of five loved the experience. None of us had partaken in an escape room before, but we found the level of the puzzles was just right to create a thought-provoking challenge, while never becoming frustratingly hard. The attention to detail in the theming really brought the story to life, and the team members we spoke to before and after were very friendly. By the time we solved the final puzzle (with less than a minute to go!) we were completely immersed in the room.Definitely worth making the short journey out of the centre of town to visit!

Amazing experience. After going to a less than stellar trap room in Berlin, I took a chance on this one with some friends. It was beyond what I had hoped. Our host was fun, polite and entertaining. The experience itself was wonderfully done. Everything I had hoped for when I first heard of trap rooms. Despite not completing in time,I thoroughly converted my friends in how fun trap rooms can be. This is something to catch while in the area

SO much fun!!!. This was SUCH a blast!! I could not believe the thought put into the different puzzles and clues; there were SO many and they were so great! Our group of four was not able to solve the riddle before the allotted time, but since we were the last group of the night, they kindly let us keep playing without letting us know we had passed the time limit, and let us solve the mystery! I'm so thankful they allowed us to taste victory (even though it took us 74 minutes)!The only slight downside to Logic Locks is its location - as said before, it is far outside the city center in a school. We were VERY uncertain as we approached the building and even as we went inside. The signage could be better, although, once you are in the basement, the set up is amazing!COULD NOT recommend this enough!! Just give yourself time to get there, and maybe google-map-image the building before going, just so you are familiar with what it looks like from the outside!!
Awesome. One of the best escape room I've played. Great set, really good puzzles and just the right amount of excitement :) thank you for this great experience

Great experience. First time in a escape room. Eager for more. Great atmosphere which contributes to the overal experience. Lot of surprises and excitement. If you are looking for an escape room in Amsterdam and you don't have a lot of experience in escape rooms, then this is one you really need to visit. A minor detail, Logic Locks is located quite far from the city center and the walk from the station takes around 10 minutes. Also never expected the room to be inside such an old building.

Very entertaining experience!. Logic locks was our first puzzle room experience and we were very impressed with the design of the place. Hannah was a great host and we wholeheartedly recommend this place for anyone who likes puzzles and games.

Amazing escape room. We really enjoyed this escape room. The four of us were prepared by a very nice and enthousiastic host in a very nice setting. The whole experience is very well thought through from beginning to end, including the preparation room. Best story so far (I've visited 5 escape rooms) and beautifuly decorated. We had lots of fun and escaped in 53 minutes! Can really recommend this room!

Best escape room in Amsterdam. Me and my friends never felt like sherlock before. It was a excellent experience! Hannah was the best story teller ever! A lot of cool things happend. Smart escape room. Just go there!!!
Very cool. Hannah is very good in setting a mysterious atmosphere and she gets the group in the right mood straight away. Very cool experience!
Fun room, nice puzzels. Fun starts even before entering the room <-- clue. Nice back story and presented well, friendly host.
Wow, what an experience. What an awesome way to spend an afternoon! Problem solving, teamwork, having fun all at the same time. Great atmosphere, you get a real adrenaline rush!

Great fun for the family!. We made our way out to Logic Locks and had a great time. Its totally family friendly, we went with our 15 and 17 year olds and managed to solve the puzzle and make our way out. Note that it appears to be a bit sketchy when you first arrive, but it is totally legit, and safe and the crew that works the place makes you feel at ease. We're now hooked on these things, and we came away with the victory coin. Highly recommend!
Awsome. A real challenge to find your way out and at the same time having a splendid afternoon! We loved it and recommand this escape room whole hartedly.Marie-Thérese

Cool experience and mind-mazing :). A nice introduction by a nice hostess, Hanna. We, group of 4, went there on a Sunday morning after a pretty tough Saturday - but had lots of fun and definitely recommendable for any given day :) The experience itself was challenging enough and at the same time.Thumbs up again for Hanna - afterall a Sunday morning for her too :)

Great escape room with personal touch. This is a great escape room with a personal touch. The puzzles are carefully crafted and the theme and atmosphere of the room are spot on. Definitely recommended!

Really good fun!. The logic locks escape room was great! Well constructed puzzles that trigger your curiosity and force you to experiment with different thinking strategies, both analytical and associative. The room is beautifully designed and the narrative really draws you in. We went in with a group of friends and it was so much fun. I can recommend it to anyone!

Ingenious place!. Great storyline, great fun.
We were with 6 international colleagues after a full day workshop. We made it out in time but it really required our collective brain power. The story is well thought trough and there are unexpected events, making you really get into the "flow". Something we all will remember for all long time. Five stars well deserved!

Fun yet challenging. Three friends and I thought we'd give this a try as we had seen on google that it was highly recommended, supported by the positive trip adviser reviews; it did not disappoint!Unfortunately the venue is a bit out of the way and in a random building in an industrial looking part of town but don't let the facade put you off, the experience is great. The rooms are very challenging and require teamwork to piece everything together but it's character building and very entertaining. I would highly recommend this and it is a great price! Also if you are a student you can claim 10% off which is even better!

Great team building adventure. I booked it as the last resort as I could not find places in other escape games. However, I was not worried as reviews were good. It is a bit more expensive than others but was worth it. Staff is very friendly, fast and ready. We were locked in a room full of locked boxes and cabinets which we had to solve clues to unlock. Amazing suspense. If you don't work together, you will never be able to be out in time, which is 63 minutes. He was very kind to leave us an extra 20 minutes as we were on the right track. Many thanks Logic locks for a fantastic time.

whaaaaaa. The room is so unusual, mysterious, and intricate. The riddle is full of enigmas and subtleties, one of the best puzzle's I've ever tried to solve. I would recommend this to groups of friends, locals, tourists, and travellers. Hannah our host was so friendly and really make the whole experience so much more .. tingly.
Logic locks. Nice room, beautiful set-up, good story line, clear end purpose, good hosts and tips at the right moments. Certainly a must do when you are in Amsterdam. So go there and try to escape!

Very well made, one of the best so far. We have been to well over 15 highly rated escape rooms in EU and this is among the top 3! Very high quality build, fun puzzles, very creative. Very enjoyable!! Not much really need to be said about Logic Locks except I hope they make another one!!

Great fun. Well-designed and structured, great fun! Worth the small journey west, this is a stylish and balanced escape room. Hanna was an enthusiastic and friendly hostess and we'd recommend it to anyone.

Me . Wasn't sure what to expect, hadn't heard of escape rooms before but saw them listed here under things to do in Amsterdam. Logic locks was fantastic, our host/guide, Hannah was terrific and did a great job setting the scene and feeding us clues when we got really stuck. The room is very atmospheric and the puzzles a lot of fun. If like us you don't know what to expect, just go with it! They are a bit out of the city centre but easily accessible by metro or tram and definitely worth the trip.
TOP!. Super nice! Made with a lot of care to the detail. Very, very creative. We did the room a couple of days ago. All happy!

WOW. I heard a lot about it before and it met all my expectations.Was great fun to work on all this riddles together and in the end find the clue to escape the room;)A little bit a pity is that due to the time pressure I did not notice where all the details for solving the puzzles were hidden, because after one of the group members found something we concentrated on solving the puzzle and not where things where found... And what a pity you can play it only once, because its an amazing escape room!!! And a great experience. Hope they will build some more escape rooms!!!
amazing!!!!. i really got scared and i had a lot of fun with my friends. everything, every detail is well thought!!! i recommend so much!!!

Do you want to feel like Indiana Jones? Tantadanta... This was the first time I went to an escape room and I went with four friends. With a pretty balanced team, two girls and three boys, we were stoked to solve some mysteries :). Pumped with energy we were running through the room to find the first clues, but after finding them we tried solve them in small teams. This worked really good and had the best time together. Much better than Amsterdam Dungeons. Because of the amazing atmosphere, decoration, sounds, mysteries it is impossible not to feel like Indiana Jones. And I can recommend you to bring your whip and head if you want to beat our time, 44 minutes. Good luck :)!

Epic first escape room experience. My first escape room experience and a great one indeed. They managed to create a truly immersive atmosphere and I could hardly believe how ingenuously some of the puzzles were designed. Champions!

Felt like a sherlock!. We had so much fun at the Logic Locks escape room. We were welcomed by a lovely guy, he was also one of the people that created Logic Locks. It was such an exciting experience, because you get dragged into a story about an adventurous woman who disappeared and you have to find out why! It gets you really involved in the story and the tension raises very high sometimes. We went inside the room with 4 persons and we think that was just the right amount of people. Really great to do!
Great room!. A lot of spooky fun. Just a slight notch below Sherlocked (in Beurs van Berlage), but still very good. Recommended!
So much fun. This was one of the best experiences I had on my trip to Amsterdam and I highly recommend it to anyone visiting.

Superb visit. Ignore the fact that Logic Locks isn't located in the most attractive or easy-to-reach suburb of Amsterdam, or that it's located in a college building with practically no signposting beyond some Post-It notes on the walls and a chalk sign outside. You could even be forgiven at this point that it's all a scam to fleece tourists while they are locked in a secure room.HOWEVER... Logic Locks actually offer a fantastic Escape Room experience. Very well constructed puzzles that could be tackled by both young and old, with clues posted under the door from outside if you are struggling. Our team of three (youngest was 8) didn't quite get to the end in the time available, although we were very close. I have no idea what other Escape Room companies are like as this was our first experience, but I would highly recommend Logic Locks.
Amazing!!!. Awesome game! Very well constructed and conducted! The scenario is thoroughly decorated and very realistic! Worth a visit!!!

The best escape room in Europe!. This is really detailed, really engaging and immersive. Friendly crew and great value for money. Much better social experience than rotting your brain in a pub.
L

Great experience. We have been here with our company in a team building outing, and I must say it was better than I anticipated. Great way to work as a team and score little victories that may lead to escaping!!

Intriguing, well made and challenging. Great experience this of the riddles room at Knowmads (like many other activities they carry on with passion and fun)If you want to live one hour (and more) plunging into the past, searching for clues and hints into a sophisticated and well decorated room, heritage of a missing explorer, this one calls for your attention.Our host Elles made a good job in both introducing us to the situation and in post analysis to check the result and the group dynamics/interactionsSo come on, go challenge your spirit of initiative, adventure and mystery with Logic Locks escape room =)
Awesome!. Very cool escape room! Been there with friends, they all enjoyed it. One of the bedt escape rooms in Amsterdam.

Incredibly well done! One of the best escape rooms in Europe!. Easy to get to via public transport & a short walk - worth the trek! I highly recommend this room to anyone!Our hostess was amazing - she gave a great intro (including a video) and really set the mood for the mystery of the room!The decor was very unique & interesting, and the puzzles were well thought out and very rewarding to solve. Some very clever puzzles & excellent prop use. The personalized hints appeared at the perfect times!We were given a commemorative token upon successfully escaping! They seem to be partnered with SaveAmsterdam (you get a small discount with a brochure) and both rooms are fantastic!
Wonderful. Seems to be in the middle of no where, but don't be put off. Really good fun. I've done one in NY but this was better! Cant recommend enough.

What a hidden gem!. This was a thoroughly enjoyable activity that was a massive hit with our group of 8. (split into 2 teams)I could see this being great for so many purposes. Friends, couples, families, team building. It is just so much fun whilst at the same time being challenging. Time literally flew by doing this activity!I would recommend this for those with a curious mind that want to challenge themselves. I had read the reviews before hand but the experience itself was far greater than that described (very well!) By others. The location itself added to the environment of the activity which made it unique compared with other escape rooms. The attention to detail was impressive and the amount of effort that went into the making this an outstanding experience was clear to be seen.Now, time to find a way to erase the memory so I can do this and enjoy it all over again!

Well worth the trip!. This room was smartly designed designed. It was just the perfect experience for my family. The organiser guided us at the right moments to ensure that we finished the challenges with pride. Thank you so much for your attention to the total experience. You deserve your success and we're happy to know that you've new expansion plans in place. Congratulations and we can't wait to play in all your 'products'.
Amazing thing to do with teenagers . We booked for a Saturday night. Had a fantastic experience. Would recommend to all. Would also recommend a taxi to find it.

Awesome unusual escape room !. We visited this escape room last week and i must say it came as a complete surprise to me how welllll everything was set up! The atmosphere, the introduction, the story, the end... It's a big succes! The fact that this room is situated in the basement of an old school building gives it and extra twist. Really recommendable! Support these guys cause i think they're very original in what they do..
Awesome!. Great experience! My friends and I loved it. Some of us were new to escape games, some not. I really recommend this one!
Awesome!. Smart and interesting puzzles, nice ambiance and decoration, cool ending. A must do for escape room addicts!
Thrilling experience. This was the first time I did an escape room event and it was a thrilling experience! This room is recommended for all the people looking to spend good time with friends!!

Great fun, something different!. Unsure what to expect but this was actually really good and something different to do. We were a stag do and probably not the usual crowd. Ideal for friends/family.
It was however the host that made the experience, Hannah was fantastic, very helpful and great fun.
Only downside is it is far out of town. Be prepared for bus/taxi journey.

Great activity to do while in Amsterdam. I look part in Logic Locks with 4 others and in summary, we found it to be a great activity. None of us had completed anything like this before and we were surprised how much we enjoyed it. We all remarked how imaginative the organisers must be to put this together.It is a couple of miles outside of the centre of Amsterdam but we had hired bikes to get around and found it only to be a 15 minute bike ride from the centre.
