Alternatively, the tram runs close by so easily accessible.I would fully recommend this to all visitors to Amsterdam who want to spend an hour doing something different.

Fantastic adventure. Think crystal maze without anything too athletic. A wonderfulVictorian mystery to be solved and just over an hour to do it! Using a mix of logic, intuition and plain good luck this event is a MUST for anyone who has read The Secret 7 or Famous 5!
Awesome!. I have been to 3 rooms and this one has been the best! Executed perfectly - awesome mechanics, hard riddles yet solvable. Very very engaging! I recommend!
Amazing experience!. It was the first escape room I did! It was a great experience and lots of fun! Definitely recommend to everyone ;)

Awesome!. It has been the first time for our group to experience an escape room, it couldn't be more fun! The guys at this place are really friendly, and obviously quite smart to create a game like this. Despite the location, not quite in the city center, a must visit!

Great fun!. This was our second escape room (Sherlocked being the first) and it lived up to the expectations! The room is set up really nice and has a lot of different puzzles and fun experiences. Special effects were great as well. We (group of 6 friends who love puzzles and games) had a great great time! Only thing is; the entire thing is in English, so if your English is not that good, this can prove a bit of a problem (although most puzzles can be solved by pure logic). Would advise!

Brilliant in Idea and Execution. There are many escape room options that I knew I had during my trip to Amsterdam, but after selecting Logic Locks I have no doubt that I went to the right place! Booking was easy to do online, and it's not difficult to get to. The room itself is wonderful. It feels cohesive in its style, while presenting a variety of puzzles that kept my entire group thinking and smiling the entire session. The execution of this escape room was beyond my admittedly high expectations. When we were stumped, we knew we were overlooking something and each time we moved forward at least one person would remark, "Clever!"I have no hesitation in recommending this experience to ANYONE who is interested. I bet that each and every person who visits this page intrigued at what they might find at Logic Locks will leave in a good mood and with a great memory.

Great Fun. Logic Locks was booked as part of a short two day trip to Amsterdam and I'm really glad we made the time to do it. The experience lasts for little over an hour and your collective brains (we were a group of four) remain entertained and engaged throughout. This was my first escape room experience and because Logic Locks was so enjoyable, my friends and I have vowed to seek out similar experiences in London. I think we've got our work cut out in finding a better escape room experience than Logic Locks. 10/10 for the staff too. They were friendly, enthusiastic and most helpful.

Brilliant and challenging. This was mine and the rest of the groups first visit to an escape room. Really would recommend it, the puzzles kept us challenged, and the atmosphere created by our wonderful host got everyone in the mood and mindset! I did genuinely get scared at one moment, and a few in our group jumped out their skin more than once - though horror isn't the point of logic locks, it was great working together to piece together the mystery and solve the puzzle.Luckily handy hints (not spoilers!) kept appearing just at the right time when we were having difficulty, and we managed to escape and complete the room. Only downside is that the location is a bit outwith the centre, not far after a tram ride. The location did feel a bit sketchy to begin with, though once inside, we were made to feel welcome. Highly recommend as something different to do.

Escape Rooms are THE thing. We visited two escape rooms in Amsterdam and we liked this one most! The guys running it where very friendly and the room is full of special details. The only thing is that the room is quite difficult and that the location is a bit strange. By bike it is a little bit far outside the city center. We saved Elisabeths hart, but, it was a close call!Cindy B.
Masterpiece of Art. Stunning put together. Not one boring minute, flow all the way through. We were 6 and got out in 45 min. Superb ending & build up of the experience.

Creative riddles, strange location, lovely story. This room is beautiful, with the most creative riddles you can imagine, completely in line with the lovely love story into which I got completely absorbed. I had wanted to do this escape room for some time but it was difficult to find a good moment with friends so in the end I joined a group of 3 other individuals all going together, which was great. It meant we immediately had to work together an get to know each other, which the room is great for. Although it would probably have been easier with friends or people I already knew. Because there are so many riddles and puzzles to solve it means you can not see everything since you have to split. However there was a possibility to quickly look through the puzzles after we were done. The room is not in a very central location and inside a larger complex, but this doesn't make it any less interesting. It is also still close to public transportation and easy to reach by bike from the centre. Also it would be a great way to discover the west of Amsterdam a bit as a tourist.I am already recommending the place to friends.

wicked. This was my first escape room ever and I was honestly concerned to make a fool out of myself. Once being locked up I felt so much fun and excitement, solving the riddles is not easy but the rewarding feeling is huge. I loved the whole atmosphere around the room and our welcoming was super warm. The love and attention with that this escape room is build makes it an outstanding experience.THUMBS UP

Wow!. Went for my first time yesterday with 3 friends. Didn't know what to expect but I was very impressed. Great exciting rooms, a great story behind the whole thing, great challenging clues, and great owners!

Designed with a lot of love. The whole experience that was designed here really impressed me. They put an insane amount of work and love for details in there. It's not just the room, it's the story, the feeling, all the little details, the riddles of course but even the furniture, everything is perfectly aligned to really let you dive into this story and get lost for the time being. It is designed with so much attention, I am really impressed. Best escape room so far.

Really great experience, good for teambuilding/friends/bachelors etc.. My friends and I (4 guys, 25 yrs) did the logic locks escape room last week. We weren't sure what to expect when we entered the building (a alternative business school) but upon decending into the LL basement we immediatly got drawn into the atmosphere. Which is a mixture of adventure, excitement, creepyness and puzzly fun. Of course I can't say anything about the room, except that is very well built, and that the artifacts in there alone are worth a visit. Must-see in Amsterdam !

Great thing to do with teens or young adults!. We live in Amsterdam and our 2 college-aged daughters were visiting for a month. After 3 weeks, I was running out of things for us to do. My daughter found Logic Locks on this website and we're very glad we did it! You need to be clever, work together and communicate with your group to complete the tasks. They will feed you clues if you get stuck but its a great interactive and highly original activity. The location isn't the most convenient, but you can get the Metro or a tram within a 10 minute walk. It's not super obvious that you're at the right spot until you see the Knowmads sign, but its worth the minor effort to get there!

Definitely recommend despite location!. We decided to visit Logic Locks as a group of 4 on our trip to Amsterdam. We were surprised by the neighbourhood and a little sceptical to go in but very glad we did. This very original attraction was a fantastic way to spend an hour, very well thought out and lots of fun. We are now seeking out our next escape room.
Loved it... Do cool. Been there in 4 and rub through an the puzzles and riddles. Very well organized and thought through. Love it!

First escape room experience was addictive!. Felt welcome from the moment we walked in. We were pulled into the storyline immediately! Puzzels were highly original and the overal atmosphere mesmerizing. Being an escape room (two actually!) that is far from easy to escape from, we were happy to júst have made it out on time for a relaxing debrief. Highly recommended, folks!

Fantastic escape room in Amsterdam!!. We were a group of 4 and really had an amazing time in Logic Locks!!! Excellent immersive room decoration, challenging puzzles, a very nice host and lots of surprises! ^^ The perfect way to spend fun time in Amsterdam with friends or family!

Felt like a child again, a happy one.. The Logic Locks escape room got me over-exited! It was fun, fast, clever and extremely joyful. It's a shame you can only do it once, since I would definitely go in again if I could. Worth time, money, effort... you name it, it's worth it.

Great challenge. A little bit distracted you step into the well designed room, a private study of a missing women (explorer Elizabeth van Leeuwenhart). At first all the elements make no sense, but after the discovery of the first puzzles you are getting up to speed pretty fast. The smart and different puzzles makes the room a great challenge to for fill with your friends

Challenging yet superb!. This escape room was my first, and it was spectacular. The puzzles were varied, original, challenging yet do-able. The room itself was very nicely made with a great eye for detail and those that solve the puzzle are in for a surprise ;) as well as a beautifully made coin to commemorate beating the challenge.Would definitely recommend!
Great experience. My first escape room, and I had a great experience! I really liked the vibe of the whole escape room and story behind it, and the puzzles were very cleverly designed.
Very good!. I went there with a group of five friends and had an excellent time! The puzzles are challenging and the whole experience is really nice.
Best escape room ever. Riddles, puzzles and mysteries are super clever and the room is original and beautifully made. I don't even like this sort of thing, but this was bloody amazing!!
AWESOME!. Awesome escape room! Puzzles are great, back story very nice and the music and decor are something else! Definitely recommend going to this one!
Original, well-organised and great fun!. Our first escape-room experience was great. Very surprising, organised with care. The host, the room, the quests.....Loved it!

Excellent. Our visit to Logic locks was one of our best choices for our vacation in Holland.
I highly recommend it to every one. You wont regret it.

Loved it. This was our first escape room and I'm hooked. The puzzles were all logic based and don't require any previous knowledge to solve, just common sense. We went with a group of five and there was enough to do to keep everyone entertained. I will definitely recommend this for a nice outing away from the crowds.
Really cool. It was very exciting a bit hard but it must be a challenge definitly something you should do when you go to Amsterdam! !

Amazing. Logic locks takes you straight back to the roaring twenties. The room is decorated beautifully wich sucks you right in the story of this old lady. The unexpected suprise moments made the room a great experience... The games are very well designed and thought through. Working together in a team in this problem solving way is definitely a booster and so much fun!

Tried out several, found this the best escape room in AMS. With a group of friends we tried out several escape rooms in Amsterdam and loved this one the most. It's so incredibly well thought out and designed that you really feel the passion the owners have put in. It's built around a great story of an ancient explorer lady that drew all of us in immediately. And on top of that it's in a really, really interesting location that's both an event and co-working space and a business school. We met great folks there and enjoyed our escape experience. This one is definitely worth trying!
Great time with firends. Amazing escape room in Amsterdam, me and my friends had an incredible time trying to solve all the mysteries around it. Great ambience , a great challenging activity!!!

WOW. I have never tried anything before like this room! Real life computer game, with a cool plot and amazing props and effects :) Would recommend it to everyone who loves to challenge their brains and try something completely out of the ordinary.

One of the best escape rooms in Amsterdam!!!. Best escape room experience in Amsterdam (for us) so far. Not only is the game very well thought through, intellectually challenging and fresh (the game consists of not only standard ruffles and locks, but also very innovative puzzles). It is also very engaging. The guys succeeding in creating the spirit of discovery and mystery. The 6 of us were totally thrilled with the game and kept discussing it hours after the game. Definitely a must to try out!

Great mix. I was positively suprised by the mix of puzzles presented in the room. There was a nice combination of beautifully crafted objects that could be fit together somehow and brainteasers to accomodate several levels at the same time. I would sincerely recommend the room as a great experience. And will definitly go again once they create their second chamber.

It`s all fun and games. All the way. It`s hard to imagine that just a trip down the stairs can take you outside of everyday habits. Until you end up in this basement! A beautiful mystery, a room full of fascinating objects that beg to be touched and a good shot of sweet adrenaline. And it`s amazing how much can be done in two small rooms and how varied the puzzled can be. Play safe

mystery. The riddles are like an collaborative IQ-test :-p It's not only your own capaicity to solve the mystery that counts but also your ability to work together and unite the pieces of the puzzle :) Clock's ticking, don't feel the pressure ;-)

Amazing escape room!. This escape room is beautiful and very well executed! The games are nice and challenging and they included a lot of cool tricks that other escape rooms do not have. I've done quite some escape rooms and this one was my favourite! The people are really cool :)

My only wish would be to get hit in the head and do it all over again!. An adventure through and through, and a re-visit to your childhood dreams where you get to embark on a genuine, thrilling journey. Loved every min. Wished it was longer. Can't wait to see what they will come up with next!!

Excellent escape room. One of the best rooms in Amsterdam. Lots of non-trivia logic tasks as well as non-linear scenario of the room. I was surprised by design and atmosphere. The introduction story of the room as well as the hosts add some additional flavor on top of it. Brilliant realization of some of riddles. As an experienced player - you will be surprised by quality and out-of-the-box riddles. As a novice - you will be amazed. Strongly advised for all!

Awesome activity!. I absolutely love this experience. I had a great time with friends. It is all about team work and get out of your comfort zone. An awesome opportunity to have a blast evening/night with friends and talk about it for a long time.

awesome Triggerfingerroom with Total freedom!. I went to Logic locks too make An item for a BNN tv show. After the footages the crew and me played the room ourselves; I was amazed by how it 'hit' me. Never experienced An escaperoom before and this one really triggerd me to play!Go there! You'll love it.XCoen
Top. Great energy. Good people!Made with a lot of love and not for the money.Had a great time and will definetly come again with some friends in march.Keep up the good work!Marius
